 4849: ssmmsr2_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun() ->
 4850:     fun(Rep) -> ssmmsr2_mg_verify_scr(Rep) end.
 4851: 
 4852: ssmmsr2_mg_verify_scr({handle_trans_reply, _CH, 1, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 4853:     (catch ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_scr(AR));
 4854: ssmmsr2_mg_verify_scr(Crap) ->
 4855:     io:format("ssmmsr2_mg_verify_scr -> error: "
 4856: 	      "~n   Crap: ~p"
 4857: 	      "~n", [Crap]),
 4858:     {error, Crap, ok}.
 4859: 
 4860: ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_scr(AR) ->
 4861:     io:format("ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_scr -> ok: "
 4862: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 4863:     CR = 
 4864: 	case AR of
 4865: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
 4866: 		CmdRep;
 4867: 	    _ ->
 4868: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 4869: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
 4870: 	end,
 4871:     SCR = 
 4872: 	case CR of
 4873: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 4874: 		ServChRep;
 4875: 	    _ ->
 4876: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
 4877: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
 4878: 	end,
 4879:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
 4880: 	case SCR of
 4881: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
 4882: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
 4883: 		{TermID, Res};
 4884: 	    _ ->
 4885: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
 4886: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
 4887: 	end,
 4888:     case Tid of
 4889: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 4890: 	    ok;
 4891: 	_ ->
 4892: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 4893: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
 4894:     end,
 4895:     SCRParm = 
 4896: 	case SCRes of
 4897: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
 4898: 		ServChResParms;
 4899: 	    _ ->
 4900: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
 4901: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
 4902: 	end,
 4903:     case SCRParm of
 4904: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
 4905: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
 4906: 	_ ->
 4907: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
 4908: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
 4909:     end.
 4910: 
 4911: ssmmsr2_mg_verify_notify_request_fun(Tids) ->
 4912:     fun(Req) -> ssmmsr2_mg_verify_notify_request(Req, Tids) end.
 4913: 	     
 4914: ssmmsr2_mg_verify_notify_request(
 4915:   {handle_trans_request, _CH, ?VERSION, ARs}, Tids) 
 4916:   when length(ARs) == length(Tids) ->
 4917:     (catch ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_notify_request(Tids, ARs));
 4918: ssmmsr2_mg_verify_notify_request(
 4919:   {handle_trans_request, _CH, ?VERSION, ARs}, _Tids) ->
 4920:     {error, {invalid_action_requests, ARs}, ok};
 4921: ssmmsr2_mg_verify_notify_request(
 4922:   {handle_trans_request, CH, V, ARs}, _Tids) ->
 4923:     {error, {invalid_trans_request, {CH, V, ARs}}, ok};
 4924: ssmmsr2_mg_verify_notify_request(Crap, _Tids) ->
 4925:     io:format("ssmmsr2_mg_verify_notify_request -> unknown request"
 4926: 	      "~n   Crap: ~p"
 4927: 	      "~n   Tids: ~p"
 4928: 	      "~n", [Crap, _Tids]),
 4929:     {error, {unexpected_event, Crap}, ok}.
 4930: 
 4931: ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_notify_request(Tids, ARs) ->
 4932:     io:format("ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_notify_request -> ok"
 4933: 	      "~n   Tids: ~p"
 4934: 	      "~n   ARs:  ~p"
 4935: 	      "~n", [Tids, ARs]),
 4936:     ActionReplies = ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_notify_request_ars(Tids, ARs), 
 4937:     io:format("ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_notify_request -> ok"
 4938: 	      "~n   ActionReplies:  ~p"
 4939: 	      "~n", [ActionReplies]),
 4940:     Reply = {{handle_ack, ssmmsr2}, ActionReplies}, 
 4941:     {ok, ARs, Reply}.
 4942: 
 4943: ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_notify_request_ars(Tids, ARs) ->
 4944:     ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_notify_request_ars(Tids, ARs, []).
 4945: 
 4946: ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_notify_request_ars([], [], Acc) ->
 4947:     lists:reverse(Acc);
 4948: ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_notify_request_ars([Tid|Tids], [AR|ARs], Acc) ->
 4949:     ActionReply = ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_notify_request_ar(Tid, AR),
 4950:     ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_notify_request_ars(Tids, ARs, [ActionReply|Acc]).
 4951: 
 4952: ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_notify_request_ar(Tid, AR) ->
 4953:     io:format("ssmmsr2_mg_do_verify_notify_request_ar -> ok"
 4954: 	      "~n   Tid: ~p"
 4955: 	      "~n   AR:  ~p"
 4956: 	      "~n", [Tid, AR]),
 4957:     {Cid, CR} = 
 4958: 	case AR of
 4959: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxId, 
 4960: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 4961: 		{CtxId, CmdReq};
 4962: 	    _ ->
 4963: 		Reason1 = {invalid_actionRequest, AR},
 4964: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
 4965: 	end,
 4966:     Cmd = 
 4967: 	case CR of
 4968: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 4969: 		Command; 
 4970: 	    _ ->
 4971: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandRequest, CR}, ok})
 4972: 	end,
 4973:     OED = 
 4974: 	case Cmd of
 4975: 	    {notifyReq, 
 4976: 	     #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [Tid],
 4977: 			      observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvDesc,
 4978: 			      errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE}} ->
 4979: 		ObsEvDesc;
 4980: 	    _ ->
 4981: 		throw({error, {invalid_command, Cmd}, ok})
 4982: 	end,
 4983:     OE = 
 4984: 	case OED of
 4985: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEv]} ->
 4986: 		ObsEv;
 4987: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = ObsEvLst} ->
 4988: 		throw({error, {invalid_observedEventLst, ObsEvLst}, ok});
 4989: 	    _ ->
 4990: 		throw({error, {invalid_ObservedEventsDescriptor, OED}, ok})
 4991: 	end,
 4992:     case OE of
 4993: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 4994: 	    ssmmsr2_mg_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid);
 4995: 	_ ->
 4996: 	    throw({error, {invalid_ObservedEvent, OE}, ok})
 4997:     end.

 5000: ssmmsr2_mg_verify_ack_fun() ->
 5001:     fun(Event) -> (catch ssmmsr2_mg_verify_ack(Event)) end.
 5002: 
 5003: ssmmsr2_mg_verify_ack({handle_trans_ack, CH, ?VERSION, AckStatus, ssmmsr2}) ->
 5004:     io:format("ssmmsr2_mg_verify_ack -> "
 5005:               "~n   AckStatus: ~p"
 5006:               "~n   CH:        ~p"
 5007:               "~n", [AckStatus, CH]),
 5008:     case AckStatus of
 5009: 	{error, Reason} ->
 5010: 	    case Reason of
 5011: 		{segment_failure, SegInfo} when is_list(SegInfo) ->
 5012: 		    io:format("ssmmsr2_mg_verify_ack -> verify not acked"
 5013: 			      "~n", []),
 5014: 		    case lists:keysearch(segments_not_acked, 1, SegInfo) of
 5015: 			{value, {segments_not_acked, [2]}} ->
 5016: 			    ok;
 5017: 			{value, {segments_not_acked, SNs}} ->
 5018: 			    X = {unexpected_not_acked_segments, SNs},
 5019: 			    throw({error, X, ok});
 5020: 			false ->
 5021: 			    X = {unexpected_seg_info, SegInfo},
 5022: 			    throw({error, X, ok})
 5023: 		    end,
 5024: 		    io:format("ssmmsr2_mg_verify_ack -> verify not sent"
 5025: 			      "~n", []),
 5026: 		    case lists:keysearch(segments_not_sent, 1, SegInfo) of
 5027: 			{value, {segments_not_sent, NotSent}} ->
 5028: 			    case [3,4,5,6,7,8] -- NotSent of
 5029: 				[] ->
 5030: 				    {ok, CH, ok};
 5031: 				_ ->
 5032: 				    Y = {unexpected_not_sent_segments, 
 5033: 					 NotSent},
 5034: 				    throw({error, Y, ok})
 5035: 			    end;
 5036: 			false ->
 5037: 			    Y = {unexpected_seg_info, SegInfo},
 5038: 			    throw({error, Y, ok})
 5039: 		    end;
 5040: 		_ ->
 5041: 		    X = {unexpected_reason, Reason},
 5042: 		    {error, X, ok}
 5043: 	    end;
 5044: 	_ ->
 5045: 	    X = {unexpected_ack_status, AckStatus},
 5046: 	    {error, X, ok}
 5047:     end;
 5048: ssmmsr2_mg_verify_ack({handle_trans_ack, CH, ?VERSION, 
 5049: 		       BadAckStatus, BadAckData}) ->
 5050:     {error, {unknown_ack_status, BadAckStatus, BadAckData, CH}, ok};
 5051: ssmmsr2_mg_verify_ack(BadEvent) ->
 5052:     {error, {unknown_event, BadEvent}, ok}.
 5053:     
 5054: 	    
 5055: ssmmsr2_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 5056:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 5057:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 5058:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 5059:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 5060:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 5061:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 5062:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 5063: 
 5064: ssmmsr2_mg_notify_reply_ar(Cid, Tid) ->
 5065:     NR = cre_notifyReply([Tid]),
 5066:     CR = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 5067:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).

 5081: recv_segmented_msg_plain(suite) ->
 5082:     [];
 5083: recv_segmented_msg_plain(doc) ->
 5084:     "Received segmented megaco message [plain]";
 5085: recv_segmented_msg_plain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5086:     Pre = fun() ->
 5087:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 5088:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 5089:                   d("start nodes: "
 5090:                     "~n      MgcNode: ~p"
 5091:                     "~n      MgNode:  ~p",
 5092:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 5093:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 5094:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes),
 5095:                   Nodes
 5096:           end,
 5097:     Case = fun(Nodes) -> do_recv_segmented_msg_plain(Config, Nodes) end,
 5098:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 5099:                    d("stop nodes"),
 5100:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 5101:            end,
 5102:     try_tc(rsmp, Pre, Case, Post).
 5103: 
 5104: do_recv_segmented_msg_plain(Config,
 5105:                             [MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 5106: 
 5107:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 5108:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 5109: 
 5110:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 5111:     MgcEvSeq = rsmp_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 5112: 
 5113:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 5114:     sleep(1000),
 5115: 
 5116:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 5117:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 5118: 
 5119:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 5120:     sleep(1000),
 5121: 
 5122:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 5123:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 5124: 
 5125:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 5126:     MgEvSeq = rsmp_mg_event_sequence(Config,
 5127:                                      text, tcp),
 5128: 
 5129:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 5130:     sleep(1000),
 5131: 
 5132:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 5133:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 5134: 
 5135:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 5136:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]),
 5137: 
 5138:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 5139:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 5140:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mgc),
 5141: 
 5142:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 5143:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 5144:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
 5145: 
 5146:     i("done", []),
 5147:     ok.
 5148:

 5154: rsmp_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 5155:     DecodeFun = rsmp_mgc_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 5156:     EncodeFun = rsmp_mgc_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 5157:     Mid       = {deviceName,"mgc"},
 5158:     ScrVerifyFun     = rsmp_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(),
 5159:     ServiceChangeRep = rsmp_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, 1),
 5160:     TermId1   = 
 5161: 	#megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000001"]},
 5162:     TermId2   = 
 5163: 	#megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000002"]},
 5164:     TermId3   = 
 5165: 	#megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000003"]},
 5166:     TermIds   = [TermId1, TermId2, TermId3], 
 5167:     TransId   = 2,
 5168:     ReqId     = 1,
 5169:     CtxId     = 1, 
 5170:     NrVerifyFun  = 
 5171: 	rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(TermIds, TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 5172:     NotifyRep1   = rsmp_mgc_notify_reply_msg(1, Mid, TransId, CtxId, TermId1),
 5173:     NotifyRep2   = rsmp_mgc_notify_reply_msg(2, Mid, TransId, CtxId, TermId2),
 5174:     NotifyRep3   = rsmp_mgc_notify_reply_msg(3, Mid, TransId, CtxId, TermId3),
 5175:     SrVerifyFun1 = rsmp_mgc_verify_segment_reply_msg_fun(1, TransId),
 5176:     SrVerifyFun2 = rsmp_mgc_verify_segment_reply_msg_fun(2, TransId),
 5177:     SrVerifyFun3 = rsmp_mgc_verify_segment_reply_msg_fun(3, TransId),
 5178:     AckVerifyFun = rsmp_mgc_verify_trans_ack_msg_fun(TransId),
 5179:     EvSeq = [{debug,  false},
 5180:              {decode, DecodeFun},
 5181:              {encode, EncodeFun},
 5182:              {listen, 2944},
 5183: 	     {expect_accept, any},
 5184:              {expect_receive, "service-change-request", {ScrVerifyFun, 5000}},
 5185:              {sleep, 500},
 5186: 
 5187:              {send, "service-change-reply",             ServiceChangeRep},
 5188:              {expect_receive, "notify-request(1)",      {NrVerifyFun, 4000}},
 5189:              {sleep, 500},
 5190: 
 5191:              {send, "notify reply - segment 1",         NotifyRep1},
 5192:              {expect_receive, "segment reply 1",        {SrVerifyFun1, 2000}},
 5193:              {sleep, 500},
 5194: 
 5195:              {send, "notify reply - segment 2",         NotifyRep2},
 5196:              {expect_receive, "segment reply 2",        {SrVerifyFun2, 2000}},
 5197:              {sleep, 500},
 5198: 
 5199:              {send, "notify reply - segment 3 (last)",  NotifyRep3},
 5200:              {expect_receive, "segment reply 3 (last)", {SrVerifyFun3, 2000}},
 5201:              {expect_receive, "ack",                    {AckVerifyFun, 4000}},
 5202:              {sleep, 1000},
 5203:              disconnect
 5204:             ],
 5205:     EvSeq.
 5206: 
 5207: rsmp_mgc_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 5208:     fun(M) ->
 5209:             Mod:encode_message(Conf, M)
 5210:     end.
 5211: 
 5212: rsmp_mgc_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 5213:     fun(M) ->
 5214:             Mod:decode_message(Conf, M)
 5215:     end.
 5216: 
 5217: rsmp_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun() ->
 5218:     fun(Msg) -> 
 5219: 	    (catch rsmp_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Msg)) 
 5220:     end.
 5221: 
 5222: rsmp_mgc_verify_service_change_req(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 5223:     io:format("rsmp_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> entry with"
 5224: 	      "~n   M: ~p"
 5225: 	      "~n", [M]),
 5226:     Body = 
 5227: 	case Mess of 
 5228: 	    #'Message'{version     = 1, 
 5229:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 5230:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 5231: 		MsgBody;
 5232: 	    _ ->
 5233: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 5234: 	end,
 5235:     Trans = 
 5236: 	case Body of
 5237:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 5238: 		Transactions;
 5239: 	    _ ->
 5240: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 5241: 	end,
 5242:     TR = 
 5243: 	case Trans of
 5244:             {transactionRequest, TransRequest} ->
 5245: 		TransRequest;
 5246: 	    _ ->
 5247: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 5248: 	end,
 5249:     AR = 
 5250: 	case TR of
 5251:             #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = _TransId,
 5252: 				  actions       = [ActionReq]} ->
 5253: 		ActionReq;
 5254: 	    _ ->
 5255: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR}})
 5256: 	end,
 5257:     CR = 
 5258: 	case AR of
 5259: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = _Cid, 
 5260: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 5261: 		CmdReq;
 5262: 	    _ ->
 5263: 		throw({error, {invalid_action, AR}})
 5264: 	end,
 5265:     Cmd = 
 5266: 	case CR of
 5267: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 5268: 		Command; 
 5269: 	    _ ->
 5270: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandRequest, CR}})
 5271: 	end,
 5272:     {Tid, Parms} = 
 5273: 	case Cmd of
 5274: 	    {serviceChangeReq, 
 5275: 	     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID      = [TermID],
 5276: 				     serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 5277: 		{TermID, ServChParms};
 5278: 	    _ ->
 5279: 		throw({error, {invalid_command, Cmd}})
 5280: 	end,
 5281:     case Tid of
 5282: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 5283: 	    ok;
 5284: 	_ ->
 5285: 	    throw({error, {invalid_terminationID, Tid}})
 5286:     end,
 5287:     case Parms of
 5288: 	%% Version 1 'ServiceChangeParm'
 5289: 	{'ServiceChangeParm', 
 5290: 	 restart,                            % serviceChangeMethod
 5291: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % serviceChangeAddress
 5292: 	 ?VERSION,                           % serviceChangeVersion,
 5293: 	 {'ServiceChangeProfile',"resgw",1}, % serviceChangeProfile
 5294: 	 [[$9,$0,$1|_]],                     % serviceChangeReason
 5295: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % serviceChangeDelay
 5296: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % serviceChangeMgcId
 5297: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % timeStamp
 5298: 	 asn1_NOVALUE                        % nonStandardData
 5299: 	} ->
 5300: 	    {ok, M};
 5301: 	_ ->
 5302: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeParms, Parms}}
 5303:     end.
 5304: 
 5305: rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 5306:     fun(Msg) -> 
 5307: 	    (catch rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req(Msg, 
 5308: 					      TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid)) 
 5309:     end.
 5310: 
 5311: rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
 5312: 			     TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 5313:     io:format("rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req -> entry with"
 5314: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 5315: 	      "~n   TermIds: ~p"
 5316: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 5317: 	      "~n   Rid:     ~p"
 5318: 	      "~n   Cid:     ~p"
 5319: 	      "~n", [M, TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid]),
 5320:     Body = 
 5321: 	case Mess of 
 5322: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 5323:                        mId         = _Mid,
 5324:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 5325: 		MsgBody;
 5326: 	    _ ->
 5327: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 5328: 	end,
 5329:     Trans = 
 5330: 	case Body of
 5331:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 5332: 		Transactions;
 5333: 	    _ ->
 5334: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 5335: 	end,
 5336:     TR = 
 5337: 	case Trans of
 5338:             {transactionRequest, TransRequest} ->
 5339: 		TransRequest;
 5340: 	    _ ->
 5341: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 5342: 	end,
 5343:     AR = 
 5344: 	case TR of
 5345:             #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = TransId,
 5346: 				  actions       = [ActReq]} ->
 5347: 		ActReq;
 5348: 	    _ ->
 5349: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR}})
 5350: 	end,
 5351:     Cmds = 
 5352: 	case AR of
 5353: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = Cid,
 5354: 			     commandRequests = Commands} ->
 5355: 		Commands;
 5356: 	    _ ->
 5357: 		throw({error, {invalid_actions, AR}})
 5358: 	end,
 5359:     ok = rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds(TermIds, Cmds),
 5360:     {ok, M};
 5361: rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req(Crap, _TermId, _TransId, _Rid, _Cid) ->
 5362:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap}}.
 5363: 
 5364: rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds([], []) ->
 5365:     ok;
 5366: rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds([TermId|TermIds], [Cmd|Cmds]) ->
 5367:     rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd(TermId, Cmd),
 5368:     rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds(TermIds, Cmds);
 5369: rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds(TermIds, Cmds) ->
 5370:      throw({error, {invalid_commands, TermIds, Cmds}}).
 5371: 
 5372: rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd(TermId, #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd}) ->
 5373:     io:format("rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd -> entry with"
 5374: 	      "~n   TermId: ~p"
 5375: 	      "~n   Cmd:    ~p"
 5376: 	      "~n", [TermId, Cmd]),
 5377:     NR = 
 5378: 	case Cmd of
 5379: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 5380: 		NotifReq;
 5381: 	    _ ->
 5382: 		throw({error, {invalid_command}})
 5383: 	end,
 5384:     OED = 
 5385: 	case NR of
 5386: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermId],
 5387: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 5388: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 5389: 		ObsEvsDesc;
 5390: 	    _ ->
 5391: 		throw({error, {invalid_notifyReq, NR}})
 5392: 	end,
 5393:     OE = 
 5394: 	case OED of 
 5395: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 5396: 		ObsEvLst;
 5397: 	    _ ->
 5398: 		throw({error, {invalid_observedEventsDescriptor, OED}})
 5399: 	end,
 5400:     case OE of
 5401: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 5402: 	    ok;
 5403: 	_ ->
 5404: 	    throw({error, {invalid_observedEventLst, OE}})
 5405:     end;
 5406: rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd(_, BadCmdReq) ->
 5407:     io:format("rsmp_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd -> invalid"
 5408: 	      "~n   BadCmdReq: ~p"
 5409: 	      "~n", [BadCmdReq]),
 5410:     throw({error, {invalid_CommandRequest, BadCmdReq}}).
 5411:

 5417: rsmp_mgc_verify_segment_reply(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M, 
 5418: 			      SN, TransId) ->
 5419:     io:format("rsmp_mgc_verify_segment_reply -> entry with"
 5420: 	      "~n   SN:      ~p"
 5421: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 5422: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 5423: 	      "~n", [SN, TransId, M]),
 5424:     Body = 
 5425: 	case Mess of 
 5426: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 5427:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 5428:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 5429: 		MsgBody;
 5430: 	    _ ->
 5431: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 5432: 	end,
 5433:     Trans = 
 5434: 	case Body of
 5435:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 5436: 		Transactions;
 5437: 	    _ ->
 5438: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 5439: 	end,
 5440:     SR = 
 5441: 	case Trans of
 5442:             {segmentReply, SegmentReply} ->
 5443: 		SegmentReply;
 5444: 	    _ ->
 5445: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 5446: 	end,
 5447:     case SR of
 5448: 	#'SegmentReply'{transactionId        = TransId,
 5449: 			segmentNumber        = SN,
 5450: 			segmentationComplete = 'NULL'} when SN == 3 ->
 5451: 	    {ok, M};
 5452: 	#'SegmentReply'{transactionId        = TransId,
 5453: 			segmentNumber        = SN,
 5454: 			segmentationComplete = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 5455: 	    {ok, M};
 5456: 	_ ->
 5457: 	    throw({error, {invalid_segmentReply, SR}})
 5458:     end;
 5459: rsmp_mgc_verify_segment_reply(Crap, SN, TransId) ->
 5460:     io:format("rsmp_mgc_verify_segment_reply -> invalid: "
 5461: 	      "~n   SN:      ~p"
 5462: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 5463: 	      "~n   Crap:    ~p"
 5464: 	      "~n", [SN, TransId, Crap]),
 5465:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap, SN, TransId}}.
 5466:

 5472: rsmp_mgc_verify_trans_ack(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M, TransId) ->
 5473:     io:format("rsmp_mgc_verify_trans_ack -> entry with"
 5474: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 5475: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 5476: 	      "~n", [TransId, M]),
 5477:     Body = 
 5478: 	case Mess of 
 5479: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 5480:                        mId         = _Mid,
 5481:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 5482: 		MsgBody;
 5483: 	    _ ->
 5484: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 5485: 	end,
 5486:     Trans = 
 5487: 	case Body of
 5488:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 5489: 		Transactions;
 5490: 	    _ ->
 5491: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 5492: 	end,
 5493:     TA = 
 5494: 	case Trans of
 5495:             {transactionResponseAck, [TransAck]} ->
 5496: 		TransAck;
 5497: 	    _ ->
 5498: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 5499: 	end,
 5500:     case TA of
 5501:             #'TransactionAck'{firstAck = TransId,
 5502: 			      lastAck  = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 5503: 		{ok, M};
 5504: 	    _ ->
 5505: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResponseAck, TA}})
 5506:     end;
 5507: rsmp_mgc_verify_trans_ack(Crap, _TransId) ->
 5508:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap}}.
 5509: 
 5510: rsmp_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, Cid) ->
 5511:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 5512:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 5513:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 5514:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 5515:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 5516:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
 5517:     TRes  = cre_transResult([AR]),
 5518:     TR    = {'TransactionReply', 1, asn1_NOVALUE, TRes}, 
 5519:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 5520:     Mess  = cre_message(1, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 5521:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 5522: 
 5523: rsmp_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
 5524:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 5525:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 5526:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).
 5527: 
 5528: rsmp_mgc_notify_reply_msg(SN, Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId) ->
 5529:     AR    = rsmp_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId),
 5530:     TRes  = cre_transResult([AR]),
 5531:     TR =
 5532: 	if
 5533: 	    SN == 3 ->
 5534: 		cre_transReply(TransId, TRes, SN, 'NULL');
 5535: 	    true ->
 5536: 		cre_transReply(TransId, TRes, SN)
 5537: 	end,
 5538:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 5539:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 5540:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 5541:

 5543: %%
 5544: %% MG generator stuff
 5545: %%
 5546: rsmp_mg_event_sequence(Config,
 5547:                        text, tcp) ->
 5548:     Mid = {deviceName,"mg"},
 5549:     RI = [
 5550:           {port,             2944},
 5551:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 5552:           {encoding_config,  []},
 5553:           {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 5554:          ],
 5555:     ServiceChangeReq = rsmp_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, 1),
 5556:     ConnectVerify = rsmp_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
 5557:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = rsmp_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun(),
 5558:     Tid1 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000001"]},
 5559:     Tid2 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000002"]},
 5560:     Tid3 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000003"]},
 5561:     Tids = [Tid1, Tid2, Tid3],
 5562:     NotifyReq = rsmp_mg_notify_request_ar(1, Tids, 1),
 5563:     NotifyReplyVerify1 = rsmp_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(1, Tid1),
 5564:     NotifyReplyVerify2 = rsmp_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(2, Tid2),
 5565:     NotifyReplyVerify3 = rsmp_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(3, Tid3),
 5566:     EvSeq = [
 5567:              {debug, true},
 5568:              %% {megaco_trace, disable},
 5569:              ?MEGACO_TRACE(Config, max), % {megaco_trace, max},
 5570:              megaco_start,
 5571:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 5572:              start_transport,
 5573:              {megaco_system_info, users},
 5574:              {megaco_system_info, connections},
 5575:              connect,
 5576:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
 5577:              megaco_connect,
 5578:              {megaco_cast,     [ServiceChangeReq], []},
 5579:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,     ConnectVerify},
 5580:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
 5581: 	     {megaco_update_user_info, protocol_version, ?VERSION}, 
 5582: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, protocol_version, ?VERSION}, 
 5583:              {sleep, 1000},
 5584:              {megaco_cast,     [NotifyReq],        []},
 5585:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify1},
 5586:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify2},
 5587:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify3},
 5588:              {sleep, 1000},
 5589:              megaco_stop_user,
 5590:              megaco_stop,
 5591:              {sleep, 1000}
 5592:             ],
 5593:     EvSeq.

 5609: rsmp_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun() ->
 5610:     fun(Rep) -> rsmp_mg_verify_scr(Rep) end.
 5611: 
 5612: rsmp_mg_verify_scr({handle_trans_reply, _CH, 1, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 5613:     (catch rsmp_mg_do_verify_scr(AR));
 5614: rsmp_mg_verify_scr(Crap) ->
 5615:     io:format("rsmp_mg_verify_scr -> error: "
 5616: 	      "~n   Crap: ~p"
 5617: 	      "~n", [Crap]),
 5618:     {error, Crap, ok}.
 5619: 
 5620: rsmp_mg_do_verify_scr(AR) ->
 5621:     io:format("rsmp_mg_do_verify_scr -> ok: "
 5622: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 5623:     CR = 
 5624: 	case AR of
 5625: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
 5626: 		CmdRep;
 5627: 	    _ ->
 5628: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 5629: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
 5630: 	end,
 5631:     SCR = 
 5632: 	case CR of
 5633: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 5634: 		ServChRep;
 5635: 	    _ ->
 5636: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
 5637: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
 5638: 	end,
 5639:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
 5640: 	case SCR of
 5641: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
 5642: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
 5643: 		{TermID, Res};
 5644: 	    _ ->
 5645: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
 5646: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
 5647: 	end,
 5648:     case Tid of
 5649: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 5650: 	    ok;
 5651: 	_ ->
 5652: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 5653: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
 5654:     end,
 5655:     SCRParm = 
 5656: 	case SCRes of
 5657: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
 5658: 		ServChResParms;
 5659: 	    _ ->
 5660: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
 5661: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
 5662: 	end,
 5663:     case SCRParm of
 5664: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
 5665: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
 5666: 	_ ->
 5667: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
 5668: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
 5669:     end.
 5670: 
 5671: rsmp_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(SN, Tid) ->
 5672:     fun(Rep) -> rsmp_mg_verify_notify_reply(Rep, SN, Tid) end.
 5673: 	     
 5674: rsmp_mg_verify_notify_reply(
 5675:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, {SN, Last, [AR]}}, _}, SN, Tid) 
 5676:   when ((SN =:= 3) andalso (Last =:= true)) orelse 
 5677:        ((SN =/= 3) andalso (Last =:= false)) ->
 5678:     (catch rsmp_mg_do_verify_notify_reply(Tid, AR));
 5679: rsmp_mg_verify_notify_reply(
 5680:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, Version, {ok, {SN1, Last, ARs}}, _}, SN2, Tid) ->
 5681:     io:format("rsmp_mg_verify_notify_reply -> unknown reply"
 5682: 	      "~n   Version: ~p"
 5683: 	      "~n   SN1:     ~p"
 5684: 	      "~n   Last:    ~p"
 5685: 	      "~n   ARs:     ~p"
 5686: 	      "~n   SN2:     ~p"
 5687: 	      "~n   Tid:     ~p"
 5688: 	      "~n", [Version, SN1, Last, ARs, SN2, Tid]),
 5689:     Crap = {unexpected_segment_data, [SN1, Last, ARs, SN2, Tid]}, 
 5690:     {error, Crap, ok};
 5691: rsmp_mg_verify_notify_reply(Crap, SN, Tid) ->
 5692:     io:format("rsmp_mg_verify_notify_reply -> unknown reply"
 5693: 	      "~n   SN:   ~p"
 5694: 	      "~n   Tid:  ~p"
 5695: 	      "~n   Crap: ~p"
 5696: 	      "~n", [SN, Tid, Crap]),
 5697:     {error, Crap, ok}.
 5698: 
 5699: rsmp_mg_do_verify_notify_reply(Tid, AR) ->
 5700:     io:format("rsmp_mg_do_verify_notify_reply -> ok"
 5701: 	      "~n   Tid:  ~p"
 5702: 	      "~n   AR:   ~p"
 5703: 	      "~n", [Tid, AR]),
 5704:     CR = 
 5705: 	case AR of
 5706: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
 5707: 		CmdRep;
 5708: 	    _ ->
 5709: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 5710: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
 5711: 	end,
 5712:     NR = 
 5713: 	case CR of
 5714: 	    {notifyReply, NotifyReply} ->
 5715: 		NotifyReply;
 5716: 	    _ ->
 5717: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
 5718: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
 5719: 	end,
 5720:     case NR of
 5721: 	#'NotifyReply'{terminationID   = [Tid],
 5722: 		       errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 5723: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
 5724: 	_ ->
 5725: 	    Reason3 = {invalid_NotifyReply, NR}, 
 5726: 	    {error, Reason3, ok}
 5727:     end.

 5730: rsmp_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 5731:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 5732:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 5733:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 5734:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 5735:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 5736:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 5737:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 5738: 
 5739: rsmp_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tids, Cid) ->
 5740:     rsmp_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tids, Cid, []).
 5741: 
 5742: rsmp_mg_notify_request_ar(_Rid, [], Cid, Cmds) ->
 5743:     cre_actionReq(Cid, lists:reverse(Cmds));
 5744: rsmp_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, [Tid|Tids], Cid, Cmds) ->
 5745:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 5746:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 5747:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 5748:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 5749:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 5750:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 5751:     rsmp_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tids, Cid, [CR|Cmds]).

 5759: 
 5760: recv_segmented_msg_ooo_seg(suite) ->
 5761:     [];
 5762: recv_segmented_msg_ooo_seg(doc) ->
 5763:     "Received segmented megaco message [out-of-order segments]";
 5764: recv_segmented_msg_ooo_seg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 5765:     Pre = fun() ->
 5766:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 5767:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 5768:                   d("start nodes: "
 5769:                     "~n   MgcNode: ~p"
 5770:                     "~n   MgNode:  ~p",
 5771:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 5772:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 5773:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes),
 5774:                   Nodes
 5775:           end,
 5776:     Case = fun(Nodes) -> do_recv_segmented_msg_ooo_seg(Config, Nodes) end,
 5777:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 5778:                    d("stop nodes"),
 5779:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 5780:            end,
 5781:     try_tc(rsmos, Pre, Case, Post).
 5782: 
 5783: do_recv_segmented_msg_ooo_seg(Config,
 5784:                               [MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 5785: 
 5786:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 5787:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 5788: 
 5789:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 5790:     MgcEvSeq = rsmos_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 5791: 
 5792:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 5793:     sleep(1000),
 5794: 
 5795:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 5796:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 5797: 
 5798:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 5799:     sleep(1000),
 5800: 
 5801:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 5802:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 5803: 
 5804:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 5805:     MgEvSeq = rsmos_mg_event_sequence(Config,
 5806:                                       text, tcp),
 5807: 
 5808:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 5809:     sleep(1000),
 5810: 
 5811:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 5812:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 5813: 
 5814:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 5815:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]),
 5816: 
 5817:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 5818:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 5819:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mgc),
 5820: 
 5821:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 5822:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 5823:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
 5824: 
 5825:     i("done", []),
 5826:     ok.
 5827: 
 5828: 
 5829: %%
 5830: %% MGC generator stuff
 5831: %%
 5832: 
 5833: rsmos_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 5834:     DecodeFun = rsmos_mgc_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 5835:     EncodeFun = rsmos_mgc_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 5836:     Mid       = {deviceName,"mgc"},
 5837:     ScrVerifyFun     = rsmos_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(),
 5838:     ServiceChangeRep = rsmos_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, 1),
 5839:     TermId1   = 
 5840: 	#megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000001"]},
 5841:     TermId2   = 
 5842: 	#megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000002"]},
 5843:     TermId3   = 
 5844: 	#megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000003"]},
 5845:     TermIds   = [TermId1, TermId2, TermId3], 
 5846:     TransId   = 2,
 5847:     ReqId     = 1,
 5848:     CtxId     = 1, 
 5849:     NrVerifyFun  = 
 5850: 	rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(TermIds, TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 5851:     NotifyRep1   = rsmos_mgc_notify_reply_msg(1, Mid, TransId, CtxId, TermId1),
 5852:     NotifyRep2   = rsmos_mgc_notify_reply_msg(2, Mid, TransId, CtxId, TermId2),
 5853:     NotifyRep3   = rsmos_mgc_notify_reply_msg(3, Mid, TransId, CtxId, TermId3),
 5854:     SrVerifyFun1 = rsmos_mgc_verify_segment_reply_msg_fun(1, TransId),
 5855:     SrVerifyFun2 = rsmos_mgc_verify_segment_reply_msg_fun(2, TransId),
 5856:     SrVerifyFun3 = rsmos_mgc_verify_segment_reply_msg_fun(3, TransId),
 5857:     AckVerifyFun = rsmos_mgc_verify_trans_ack_msg_fun(TransId),
 5858:     EvSeq = [{debug,  false},
 5859:              {decode, DecodeFun},
 5860:              {encode, EncodeFun},
 5861:              {listen, 2944},
 5862: 	     {expect_accept, any},
 5863:              {expect_receive, "service-change-request", {ScrVerifyFun, 5000}},
 5864:              {send, "service-change-reply",             ServiceChangeRep},
 5865:              {expect_receive, "notify-request",         {NrVerifyFun,  4000}},
 5866:              {send, "notify reply - segment 3",  NotifyRep3},
 5867:              {expect_receive, "segment reply 3", {SrVerifyFun3, 2000}},
 5868:              {sleep, 1000},
 5869:              {send, "notify reply - segment 2",         NotifyRep2},
 5870:              {expect_receive, "segment reply 2",        {SrVerifyFun2, 2000}},
 5871:              {sleep, 1000},
 5872:              {send, "notify reply - segment 1 (last)",  NotifyRep1},
 5873:              {expect_receive, "segment reply 1 (last)", {SrVerifyFun1, 2000}},
 5874:              {expect_receive, "ack",                    {AckVerifyFun, 4000}},
 5875: 	     {expect_nothing, 10000},
 5876:              disconnect
 5877:             ],
 5878:     EvSeq.
 5879:

 5882:             Mod:encode_message(Conf, M)

 5890: rsmos_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun() ->
 5891:     fun(Msg) -> 
 5892: 	    (catch rsmos_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Msg)) 
 5893:     end.
 5894: 
 5895: rsmos_mgc_verify_service_change_req(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 5896:     io:format("rsmos_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> entry with"
 5897: 	      "~n   M: ~p"
 5898: 	      "~n", [M]),
 5899:     Body = 
 5900: 	case Mess of 
 5901: 	    #'Message'{version     = 1, 
 5902:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 5903:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 5904: 		MsgBody;
 5905: 	    _ ->
 5906: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 5907: 	end,
 5908:     Trans = 
 5909: 	case Body of
 5910:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 5911: 		Transactions;
 5912: 	    _ ->
 5913: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 5914: 	end,
 5915:     TR = 
 5916: 	case Trans of
 5917:             {transactionRequest, TransRequest} ->
 5918: 		TransRequest;
 5919: 	    _ ->
 5920: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 5921: 	end,
 5922:     AR = 
 5923: 	case TR of
 5924:             #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = _TransId,
 5925: 				  actions       = [ActionReq]} ->
 5926: 		ActionReq;
 5927: 	    _ ->
 5928: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR}})
 5929: 	end,
 5930:     CR = 
 5931: 	case AR of
 5932: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = _Cid, 
 5933: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 5934: 		CmdReq;
 5935: 	    _ ->
 5936: 		throw({error, {invalid_action, AR}})
 5937: 	end,
 5938:     Cmd = 
 5939: 	case CR of
 5940: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 5941: 		Command; 
 5942: 	    _ ->
 5943: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandRequest, CR}})
 5944: 	end,
 5945:     {Tid, Parms} = 
 5946: 	case Cmd of
 5947: 	    {serviceChangeReq, 
 5948: 	     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID      = [TermID],
 5949: 				     serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 5950: 		{TermID, ServChParms};
 5951: 	    _ ->
 5952: 		throw({error, {invalid_command, Cmd}})
 5953: 	end,
 5954:     case Tid of
 5955: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 5956: 	    ok;
 5957: 	_ ->
 5958: 	    throw({error, {invalid_terminationID, Tid}})
 5959:     end,
 5960:     case Parms of
 5961: 	%% Version 1 'ServiceChangeParm'
 5962: 	{'ServiceChangeParm', 
 5963: 	 restart,                            % serviceChangeMethod
 5964: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % serviceChangeAddress
 5965: 	 ?VERSION,                           % serviceChangeVersion,
 5966: 	 {'ServiceChangeProfile',"resgw",1}, % serviceChangeProfile
 5967: 	 [[$9,$0,$1|_]],                     % serviceChangeReason
 5968: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % serviceChangeDelay
 5969: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % serviceChangeMgcId
 5970: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % timeStamp
 5971: 	 asn1_NOVALUE                        % nonStandardData
 5972: 	} ->
 5973: 	    {ok, M};
 5974: 	_ ->
 5975: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeParms, Parms}}
 5976:     end.
 5977: 
 5978: rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 5979:     fun(Msg) -> 
 5980: 	    (catch rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req(Msg, 
 5981: 					      TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid)) 
 5982:     end.
 5983: 
 5984: rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
 5985: 			     TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 5986:     io:format("rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req -> entry with"
 5987: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 5988: 	      "~n   TermIds: ~p"
 5989: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 5990: 	      "~n   Rid:     ~p"
 5991: 	      "~n   Cid:     ~p"
 5992: 	      "~n", [M, TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid]),
 5993:     Body = 
 5994: 	case Mess of 
 5995: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 5996:                        mId         = _Mid,
 5997:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 5998: 		MsgBody;
 5999: 	    _ ->
 6000: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 6001: 	end,
 6002:     Trans = 
 6003: 	case Body of
 6004:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 6005: 		Transactions;
 6006: 	    _ ->
 6007: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 6008: 	end,
 6009:     TR = 
 6010: 	case Trans of
 6011:             {transactionRequest, TransRequest} ->
 6012: 		TransRequest;
 6013: 	    _ ->
 6014: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 6015: 	end,
 6016:     AR = 
 6017: 	case TR of
 6018:             #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = TransId,
 6019: 				  actions       = [ActReq]} ->
 6020: 		ActReq;
 6021: 	    _ ->
 6022: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR}})
 6023: 	end,
 6024:     Cmds = 
 6025: 	case AR of
 6026: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = Cid,
 6027: 			     commandRequests = Commands} ->
 6028: 		Commands;
 6029: 	    _ ->
 6030: 		throw({error, {invalid_actions, AR}})
 6031: 	end,
 6032:     ok = rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds(TermIds, Cmds),
 6033:     {ok, M};
 6034: rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req(Crap, _TermId, _TransId, _Rid, _Cid) ->
 6035:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap}}.
 6036: 
 6037: rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds([], []) ->
 6038:     ok;
 6039: rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds([TermId|TermIds], [Cmd|Cmds]) ->
 6040:     rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd(TermId, Cmd),
 6041:     rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds(TermIds, Cmds);
 6042: rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds(TermIds, Cmds) ->
 6043:      throw({error, {invalid_commands, TermIds, Cmds}}).
 6044: 
 6045: rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd(TermId, #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd}) ->
 6046:     io:format("rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd -> entry with"
 6047: 	      "~n   TermId: ~p"
 6048: 	      "~n   Cmd:    ~p"
 6049: 	      "~n", [TermId, Cmd]),
 6050:     NR = 
 6051: 	case Cmd of
 6052: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 6053: 		NotifReq;
 6054: 	    _ ->
 6055: 		throw({error, {invalid_command}})
 6056: 	end,
 6057:     OED = 
 6058: 	case NR of
 6059: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermId],
 6060: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 6061: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 6062: 		ObsEvsDesc;
 6063: 	    _ ->
 6064: 		throw({error, {invalid_notifyReq, NR}})
 6065: 	end,
 6066:     OE = 
 6067: 	case OED of 
 6068: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 6069: 		ObsEvLst;
 6070: 	    _ ->
 6071: 		throw({error, {invalid_observedEventsDescriptor, OED}})
 6072: 	end,
 6073:     case OE of
 6074: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 6075: 	    ok;
 6076: 	_ ->
 6077: 	    throw({error, {invalid_observedEventLst, OE}})
 6078:     end;
 6079: rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd(_, BadCmdReq) ->
 6080:     io:format("rsmos_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd -> invalid"
 6081: 	      "~n   BadCmdReq: ~p"
 6082: 	      "~n", [BadCmdReq]),
 6083:     throw({error, {invalid_CommandRequest, BadCmdReq}}).
 6084: 
 6085: rsmos_mgc_verify_segment_reply_msg_fun(SN, TransId) ->
 6086:     fun(Msg) -> 
 6087: 	    (catch rsmos_mgc_verify_segment_reply(Msg, SN, TransId)) 
 6088:     end.
 6089: 
 6090: rsmos_mgc_verify_segment_reply(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M, 
 6091: 			      SN, TransId) ->
 6092:     io:format("rsmos_mgc_verify_segment_reply -> entry with"
 6093: 	      "~n   SN:      ~p"
 6094: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 6095: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 6096: 	      "~n", [SN, TransId, M]),
 6097:     Body = 
 6098: 	case Mess of 
 6099: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 6100:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 6101:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 6102: 		MsgBody;
 6103: 	    _ ->
 6104: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 6105: 	end,
 6106:     Trans = 
 6107: 	case Body of
 6108:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 6109: 		Transactions;
 6110: 	    _ ->
 6111: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 6112: 	end,
 6113:     SR = 
 6114: 	case Trans of
 6115:             {segmentReply, SegmentReply} ->
 6116: 		SegmentReply;
 6117: 	    _ ->
 6118: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 6119: 	end,
 6120:     case SR of
 6121: 	#'SegmentReply'{transactionId        = TransId,
 6122: 			segmentNumber        = SN,
 6123: 			segmentationComplete = 'NULL'} when SN == 3 ->
 6124: 	    {ok, M};
 6125: 	#'SegmentReply'{transactionId        = TransId,
 6126: 			segmentNumber        = SN,
 6127: 			segmentationComplete = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 6128: 	    {ok, M};
 6129: 	_ ->
 6130: 	    throw({error, {invalid_segmentReply, SR}})
 6131:     end;
 6132: rsmos_mgc_verify_segment_reply(Crap, SN, TransId) ->
 6133:     io:format("rsmos_mgc_verify_segment_reply -> invalid: "
 6134: 	      "~n   SN:      ~p"
 6135: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 6136: 	      "~n   Crap:    ~p"
 6137: 	      "~n", [SN, TransId, Crap]),
 6138:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap, SN, TransId}}.
 6139: 
 6140: rsmos_mgc_verify_trans_ack_msg_fun(TransId) ->
 6141:     fun(Msg) -> 
 6142: 	    (catch rsmos_mgc_verify_trans_ack(Msg, TransId)) 
 6143:     end.
 6144: 
 6145: rsmos_mgc_verify_trans_ack(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M, TransId) ->
 6146:     io:format("rsmos_mgc_verify_trans_ack -> entry with"
 6147: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 6148: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 6149: 	      "~n", [TransId, M]),
 6150:     Body = 
 6151: 	case Mess of 
 6152: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 6153:                        mId         = _Mid,
 6154:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 6155: 		MsgBody;
 6156: 	    _ ->
 6157: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 6158: 	end,
 6159:     Trans = 
 6160: 	case Body of
 6161:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 6162: 		Transactions;
 6163: 	    _ ->
 6164: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 6165: 	end,
 6166:     TA = 
 6167: 	case Trans of
 6168:             {transactionResponseAck, [TransAck]} ->
 6169: 		TransAck;
 6170: 	    _ ->
 6171: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 6172: 	end,
 6173:     case TA of
 6174:             #'TransactionAck'{firstAck = TransId,
 6175: 			      lastAck  = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 6176: 		{ok, M};
 6177: 	    _ ->
 6178: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionResponseAck, TA}})
 6179:     end;
 6180: rsmos_mgc_verify_trans_ack(Crap, _TransId) ->
 6181:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap}}.

 6183: rsmos_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, Cid) ->
 6184:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 6185:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 6186:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 6187:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 6188:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 6189:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
 6190:     TRes  = cre_transResult([AR]),
 6191:     TR    = {'TransactionReply', 1, asn1_NOVALUE, TRes}, 
 6192:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 6193:     Mess  = cre_message(1, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 6194:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 6195: 
 6196: rsmos_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
 6197:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 6198:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 6199:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).
 6200: 
 6201: rsmos_mgc_notify_reply_msg(SN, Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId) ->
 6202:     AR    = rsmos_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId),
 6203:     TRes  = cre_transResult([AR]),
 6204:     TR =
 6205: 	if
 6206: 	    SN == 3 ->
 6207: 		cre_transReply(TransId, TRes, SN, 'NULL');
 6208: 	    true ->
 6209: 		cre_transReply(TransId, TRes, SN)
 6210: 	end,
 6211:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 6212:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 6213:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).

 6260:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify2},

 6282: rsmos_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun() ->
 6283:     fun(Rep) -> rsmos_mg_verify_scr(Rep) end.
 6284: 
 6285: rsmos_mg_verify_scr({handle_trans_reply, _CH, 1, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 6286:     (catch rsmos_mg_do_verify_scr(AR));
 6287: rsmos_mg_verify_scr(Crap) ->
 6288:     io:format("rsmos_mg_verify_scr -> error: "
 6289: 	      "~n   Crap: ~p"
 6290: 	      "~n", [Crap]),
 6291:     {error, Crap, ok}.
 6292: 
 6293: rsmos_mg_do_verify_scr(AR) ->
 6294:     io:format("rsmos_mg_do_verify_scr -> ok: "
 6295: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 6296:     CR = 
 6297: 	case AR of
 6298: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
 6299: 		CmdRep;
 6300: 	    _ ->
 6301: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 6302: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
 6303: 	end,
 6304:     SCR = 
 6305: 	case CR of
 6306: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 6307: 		ServChRep;
 6308: 	    _ ->
 6309: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
 6310: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
 6311: 	end,
 6312:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
 6313: 	case SCR of
 6314: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
 6315: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
 6316: 		{TermID, Res};
 6317: 	    _ ->
 6318: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
 6319: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
 6320: 	end,
 6321:     case Tid of
 6322: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 6323: 	    ok;
 6324: 	_ ->
 6325: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 6326: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
 6327:     end,
 6328:     SCRParm = 
 6329: 	case SCRes of
 6330: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
 6331: 		ServChResParms;
 6332: 	    _ ->
 6333: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
 6334: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
 6335: 	end,
 6336:     case SCRParm of
 6337: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
 6338: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
 6339: 	_ ->
 6340: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
 6341: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
 6342:     end.

 6363: 	      "~n   AR:   ~p"
 6364: 	      "~n", [Tid, AR]),

 6428:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),

 6436: recv_segmented_msg_missing_seg1(suite) ->
 6437:     [];
 6438: recv_segmented_msg_missing_seg1(doc) ->
 6439:     "Received segmented megaco message with one segment missing "
 6440: 	"using plain integer recv segment timer";
 6441: recv_segmented_msg_missing_seg1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 6442:     Pre = fun() ->
 6443:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 6444:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 6445:                   d("start nodes: "
 6446:                     "~n   MgcNode: ~p"
 6447:                     "~n   MgNode:  ~p",
 6448:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 6449:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 6450:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes),
 6451:                   Nodes
 6452:           end,
 6453:     Case = fun do_recv_segmented_msg_missing_seg1/1,
 6454:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 6455:                    d("stop nodes"),
 6456:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 6457:            end,
 6458:     try_tc(rsmms1, Pre, Case, Post).
 6459: 
 6460: do_recv_segmented_msg_missing_seg1([MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 6461: 
 6462:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 6463:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 6464: 
 6465:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 6466:     MgcEvSeq = rsmms1_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 6467: 
 6468:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 6469:     sleep(1000),
 6470: 
 6471:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 6472:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 6473: 
 6474:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 6475:     sleep(1000),
 6476: 
 6477:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 6478:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 6479: 
 6480:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 6481:     MgEvSeq = rsmms1_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 6482: 
 6483:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 6484:     sleep(1000),
 6485: 
 6486:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 6487:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 6488: 
 6489:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 6490:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]),
 6491: 
 6492:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 6493:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 6494:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mgc),
 6495: 
 6496:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 6497:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 6498:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
 6499: 
 6500:     i("done", []),
 6501:     ok.

 6508: rsmms1_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 6509:     DecodeFun = rsmms1_mgc_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 6510:     EncodeFun = rsmms1_mgc_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 6511:     Mid       = {deviceName,"mgc"},
 6512:     ScrVerifyFun     = rsmms1_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(),
 6513:     ServiceChangeRep = rsmms1_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, 1),
 6514:     TermId1   = 
 6515: 	#megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000001"]},
 6516:     TermId2   = 
 6517: 	#megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000002"]},
 6518:     TermId3   = 
 6519: 	#megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000003"]},
 6520:     TermIds   = [TermId1, TermId2, TermId3], 
 6521:     TransId   = 2,
 6522:     ReqId     = 1,
 6523:     CtxId     = 1, 
 6524:     NrVerifyFun  = 
 6525: 	rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(TermIds, TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 6526:     NotifyRep1   = 
 6527: 	rsmms1_mgc_notify_reply_msg(1, Mid, TransId, CtxId, TermId1),
 6528:     NotifyRep3   = 
 6529: 	rsmms1_mgc_notify_reply_msg(3, Mid, TransId, CtxId, TermId3),
 6530:     SrVerifyFun1 = rsmms1_mgc_verify_segment_reply_msg_fun(1, TransId),
 6531:     SrVerifyFun3 = rsmms1_mgc_verify_segment_reply_msg_fun(3, TransId),
 6532:     MissingSegVerifyFun = rsmms1_mgc_verify_missing_segment_fun("2"),
 6533:     EvSeq = [{debug,  false},
 6534:              {decode, DecodeFun},
 6535:              {encode, EncodeFun},
 6536:              {listen, 2944},
 6537: 	     {expect_accept, any},
 6538:              {expect_receive, "service-change-request", {ScrVerifyFun, 5000}},
 6539:              {send, "service-change-reply",             ServiceChangeRep},
 6540:              {expect_receive, "notify-request",         {NrVerifyFun,  4000}},
 6541:              {sleep, 1000},
 6542:              {send, "notify reply - segment 1",         NotifyRep1},
 6543:              {expect_receive, "segment reply 1",        {SrVerifyFun1, 2000}},
 6544:              {sleep, 1000},
 6545:              {send, "notify reply - segment 3",         NotifyRep3},
 6546:              {expect_receive, "segment reply 3",        {SrVerifyFun3, 2000}},
 6547:              {expect_receive, "missing segment error",  {MissingSegVerifyFun, 4000}},
 6548: 	     {expect_nothing, 10000},
 6549:              disconnect
 6550:             ],
 6551:     EvSeq.

 6555:             Mod:encode_message(Conf, M)

 6559:     fun(M) ->
 6560:             Mod:decode_message(Conf, M)

 6563: rsmms1_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun() ->
 6564:     fun(Msg) -> 
 6565: 	    (catch rsmms1_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Msg)) 
 6566:     end.
 6567: 
 6568: rsmms1_mgc_verify_service_change_req(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 6569:     io:format("rsmms1_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> entry with"
 6570: 	      "~n   M: ~p"
 6571: 	      "~n", [M]),
 6572:     Body = 
 6573: 	case Mess of 
 6574: 	    #'Message'{version     = 1, 
 6575:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 6576:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 6577: 		MsgBody;
 6578: 	    _ ->
 6579: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 6580: 	end,
 6581:     Trans = 
 6582: 	case Body of
 6583:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 6584: 		Transactions;
 6585: 	    _ ->
 6586: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 6587: 	end,
 6588:     TR = 
 6589: 	case Trans of
 6590:             {transactionRequest, TransRequest} ->
 6591: 		TransRequest;
 6592: 	    _ ->
 6593: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 6594: 	end,
 6595:     AR = 
 6596: 	case TR of
 6597:             #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = _TransId,
 6598: 				  actions       = [ActionReq]} ->
 6599: 		ActionReq;
 6600: 	    _ ->
 6601: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR}})
 6602: 	end,
 6603:     CR = 
 6604: 	case AR of
 6605: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = _Cid, 
 6606: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 6607: 		CmdReq;
 6608: 	    _ ->
 6609: 		throw({error, {invalid_action, AR}})
 6610: 	end,
 6611:     Cmd = 
 6612: 	case CR of
 6613: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 6614: 		Command; 
 6615: 	    _ ->
 6616: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandRequest, CR}})
 6617: 	end,
 6618:     {Tid, Parms} = 
 6619: 	case Cmd of
 6620: 	    {serviceChangeReq, 
 6621: 	     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID      = [TermID],
 6622: 				     serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 6623: 		{TermID, ServChParms};
 6624: 	    _ ->
 6625: 		throw({error, {invalid_command, Cmd}})
 6626: 	end,
 6627:     case Tid of
 6628: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 6629: 	    ok;
 6630: 	_ ->
 6631: 	    throw({error, {invalid_terminationID, Tid}})
 6632:     end,
 6633:     case Parms of
 6634: 	%% Version 1 'ServiceChangeParm'
 6635: 	{'ServiceChangeParm', 
 6636: 	 restart,                            % serviceChangeMethod
 6637: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % serviceChangeAddress
 6638: 	 ?VERSION,                           % serviceChangeVersion,
 6639: 	 {'ServiceChangeProfile',"resgw",1}, % serviceChangeProfile
 6640: 	 [[$9,$0,$1|_]],                     % serviceChangeReason
 6641: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % serviceChangeDelay
 6642: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % serviceChangeMgcId
 6643: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % timeStamp
 6644: 	 asn1_NOVALUE                        % nonStandardData
 6645: 	} ->
 6646: 	    {ok, M};
 6647: 	_ ->
 6648: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeParms, Parms}}
 6649:     end.
 6650: 
 6651: rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 6652:     fun(Msg) -> 
 6653: 	    (catch rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req(Msg, 
 6654: 					      TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid)) 
 6655:     end.
 6656: 
 6657: rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
 6658: 			     TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 6659:     io:format("rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req -> entry with"
 6660: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 6661: 	      "~n   TermIds: ~p"
 6662: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 6663: 	      "~n   Rid:     ~p"
 6664: 	      "~n   Cid:     ~p"
 6665: 	      "~n", [M, TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid]),
 6666:     Body = 
 6667: 	case Mess of 
 6668: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 6669:                        mId         = _Mid,
 6670:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 6671: 		MsgBody;
 6672: 	    _ ->
 6673: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 6674: 	end,
 6675:     Trans = 
 6676: 	case Body of
 6677:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 6678: 		Transactions;
 6679: 	    _ ->
 6680: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 6681: 	end,
 6682:     TR = 
 6683: 	case Trans of
 6684:             {transactionRequest, TransRequest} ->
 6685: 		TransRequest;
 6686: 	    _ ->
 6687: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 6688: 	end,
 6689:     AR = 
 6690: 	case TR of
 6691:             #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = TransId,
 6692: 				  actions       = [ActReq]} ->
 6693: 		ActReq;
 6694: 	    _ ->
 6695: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR}})
 6696: 	end,
 6697:     Cmds = 
 6698: 	case AR of
 6699: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = Cid,
 6700: 			     commandRequests = Commands} ->
 6701: 		Commands;
 6702: 	    _ ->
 6703: 		throw({error, {invalid_actions, AR}})
 6704: 	end,
 6705:     ok = rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds(TermIds, Cmds),
 6706:     {ok, M};
 6707: rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req(Crap, _TermId, _TransId, _Rid, _Cid) ->
 6708:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap}}.
 6709: 
 6710: rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds([], []) ->
 6711:     ok;
 6712: rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds([TermId|TermIds], [Cmd|Cmds]) ->
 6713:     rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd(TermId, Cmd),
 6714:     rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds(TermIds, Cmds);
 6715: rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds(TermIds, Cmds) ->
 6716:      throw({error, {invalid_commands, TermIds, Cmds}}).
 6717: 
 6718: rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd(TermId, #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd}) ->
 6719:     io:format("rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd -> entry with"
 6720: 	      "~n   TermId: ~p"
 6721: 	      "~n   Cmd:    ~p"
 6722: 	      "~n", [TermId, Cmd]),
 6723:     NR = 
 6724: 	case Cmd of
 6725: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 6726: 		NotifReq;
 6727: 	    _ ->
 6728: 		throw({error, {invalid_command}})
 6729: 	end,
 6730:     OED = 
 6731: 	case NR of
 6732: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermId],
 6733: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 6734: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 6735: 		ObsEvsDesc;
 6736: 	    _ ->
 6737: 		throw({error, {invalid_notifyReq, NR}})
 6738: 	end,
 6739:     OE = 
 6740: 	case OED of 
 6741: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 6742: 		ObsEvLst;
 6743: 	    _ ->
 6744: 		throw({error, {invalid_observedEventsDescriptor, OED}})
 6745: 	end,
 6746:     case OE of
 6747: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 6748: 	    ok;
 6749: 	_ ->
 6750: 	    throw({error, {invalid_observedEventLst, OE}})
 6751:     end;
 6752: rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd(_, BadCmdReq) ->
 6753:     io:format("rsmms1_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd -> invalid"
 6754: 	      "~n   BadCmdReq: ~p"
 6755: 	      "~n", [BadCmdReq]),
 6756:     throw({error, {invalid_CommandRequest, BadCmdReq}}).
 6757: 
 6758: rsmms1_mgc_verify_segment_reply_msg_fun(SN, TransId) ->
 6759:     fun(Msg) -> 
 6760: 	    (catch rsmms1_mgc_verify_segment_reply(Msg, SN, TransId)) 
 6761:     end.
 6762: 
 6763: rsmms1_mgc_verify_segment_reply(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M, 
 6764: 			      SN, TransId) ->
 6765:     io:format("rsmms1_mgc_verify_segment_reply -> entry with"
 6766: 	      "~n   SN:      ~p"
 6767: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 6768: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 6769: 	      "~n", [SN, TransId, M]),
 6770:     Body = 
 6771: 	case Mess of 
 6772: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 6773:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 6774:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 6775: 		MsgBody;
 6776: 	    _ ->
 6777: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 6778: 	end,
 6779:     Trans = 
 6780: 	case Body of
 6781:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 6782: 		Transactions;
 6783: 	    _ ->
 6784: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 6785: 	end,
 6786:     SR = 
 6787: 	case Trans of
 6788:             {segmentReply, SegmentReply} ->
 6789: 		SegmentReply;
 6790: 	    _ ->
 6791: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 6792: 	end,
 6793:     case SR of
 6794: 	#'SegmentReply'{transactionId        = TransId,
 6795: 			segmentNumber        = SN,
 6796: 			segmentationComplete = 'NULL'} when SN == 3 ->
 6797: 	    {ok, M};
 6798: 	#'SegmentReply'{transactionId        = TransId,
 6799: 			segmentNumber        = SN,
 6800: 			segmentationComplete = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 6801: 	    {ok, M};
 6802: 	_ ->
 6803: 	    throw({error, {invalid_segmentReply, SR}})
 6804:     end;
 6805: rsmms1_mgc_verify_segment_reply(Crap, SN, TransId) ->
 6806:     io:format("rsmms1_mgc_verify_segment_reply -> invalid: "
 6807: 	      "~n   SN:      ~p"
 6808: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 6809: 	      "~n   Crap:    ~p"
 6810: 	      "~n", [SN, TransId, Crap]),
 6811:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap, SN, TransId}}.

 6817: rsmms1_mgc_verify_missing_segment(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M, Text) ->
 6818:     io:format("rsmms1_mgc_verify_missing_segment -> entry with"
 6819: 	      "~n   Text: ~p"
 6820: 	      "~n   M:    ~p"
 6821: 	      "~n", [Text, M]),
 6822:     Body = 
 6823: 	case Mess of 
 6824: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 6825:                        mId         = _Mid,
 6826:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 6827: 		MsgBody;
 6828: 	    _ ->
 6829: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 6830: 	end,
 6831:     case Body of
 6832: 	{messageError, 
 6833: 	 #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = ?megaco_segments_not_received,
 6834: 			    errorText = Text}} ->
 6835: 	    {ok, M};
 6836: 	_ ->
 6837: 	    throw({error, {invalid_messageError, Body}})
 6838:     end;
 6839: rsmms1_mgc_verify_missing_segment(Crap, _SN) ->

 6842: rsmms1_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, Cid) ->
 6843:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 6844:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 6845:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 6846:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 6847:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 6848:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
 6849:     TRes  = cre_transResult([AR]),
 6850:     TR    = {'TransactionReply', 1, asn1_NOVALUE, TRes}, 
 6851:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 6852:     Mess  = cre_message(1, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 6853:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 6854: 
 6855: rsmms1_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
 6856:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 6857:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 6858:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).
 6859: 
 6860: rsmms1_mgc_notify_reply_msg(SN, Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId) ->
 6861:     AR    = rsmms1_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId),
 6862:     TRes  = cre_transResult([AR]),
 6863:     TR =
 6864: 	if
 6865: 	    SN == 3 ->
 6866: 		cre_transReply(TransId, TRes, SN, 'NULL');
 6867: 	    true ->
 6868: 		cre_transReply(TransId, TRes, SN)
 6869: 	end,
 6870:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 6871:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 6872:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 6873:

 6890:     Tid2 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000002"]},
 6891:     Tid3 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000003"]},
 6892:     Tids = [Tid1, Tid2, Tid3],
 6893:     NotifyReq = rsmms1_mg_notify_request_ar(1, Tids, 1),
 6894:     NotifyReplyVerify1 = rsmms1_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(1, Tid1),
 6895:     NotifyReplyVerify3 = rsmms1_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(3, Tid3),
 6896:     SegTimeoutVerify   = rsmms1_mg_verify_segment_timeout_fun(2), 
 6897:     DiscoVerify        = rsmms1_mg_verify_handle_disco_fun(), 
 6898:     EvSeq = [
 6899:              {debug, true},
 6900: 	     {megaco_trace, disable},
 6901:              %% {megaco_trace, max},
 6902:              megaco_start,
 6903:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 6904:              start_transport,
 6905:              {megaco_system_info, users},
 6906:              {megaco_system_info, connections},
 6907: 	     {megaco_update_user_info, segment_recv_timer, 3000}, 
 6908:              connect,
 6909:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
 6910:              megaco_connect,
 6911:              {megaco_cast,     [ServiceChangeReq], []},
 6912:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,     ConnectVerify},
 6913:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
 6914: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, protocol_version, ?VERSION}, 
 6915:              {sleep, 1000},
 6916:              {megaco_cast,     [NotifyReq],        []},
 6917:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify1},
 6918:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify3},
 6919:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, SegTimeoutVerify},
 6920:              {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,  DiscoVerify},
 6921:              megaco_stop_user,
 6922:              megaco_stop
 6923:             ],
 6924:     EvSeq.

 6940: rsmms1_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun() ->
 6941:     fun(Rep) -> rsmms1_mg_verify_scr(Rep) end.
 6942: 
 6943: rsmms1_mg_verify_scr({handle_trans_reply, _CH, 1, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 6944:     (catch rsmms1_mg_do_verify_scr(AR));
 6945: rsmms1_mg_verify_scr(Crap) ->
 6946:     io:format("rsmms1_mg_verify_scr -> error: "
 6947: 	      "~n   Crap: ~p"
 6948: 	      "~n", [Crap]),
 6949:     {error, Crap, ok}.
 6950: 
 6951: rsmms1_mg_do_verify_scr(AR) ->
 6952:     io:format("rsmms1_mg_do_verify_scr -> ok: "
 6953: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 6954:     CR = 
 6955: 	case AR of
 6956: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
 6957: 		CmdRep;
 6958: 	    _ ->
 6959: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 6960: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
 6961: 	end,
 6962:     SCR = 
 6963: 	case CR of
 6964: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 6965: 		ServChRep;
 6966: 	    _ ->
 6967: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
 6968: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
 6969: 	end,
 6970:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
 6971: 	case SCR of
 6972: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
 6973: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
 6974: 		{TermID, Res};
 6975: 	    _ ->
 6976: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
 6977: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
 6978: 	end,
 6979:     case Tid of
 6980: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 6981: 	    ok;
 6982: 	_ ->
 6983: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 6984: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
 6985:     end,
 6986:     SCRParm = 
 6987: 	case SCRes of
 6988: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
 6989: 		ServChResParms;
 6990: 	    _ ->
 6991: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
 6992: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
 6993: 	end,
 6994:     case SCRParm of
 6995: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
 6996: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
 6997: 	_ ->
 6998: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
 6999: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
 7000:     end.
 7001:

 7005: rsmms1_mg_verify_notify_reply(

 7008:     (catch rsmms1_mg_do_verify_notify_reply(Tid, AR));
 7009: rsmms1_mg_verify_notify_reply(Crap, SN, Tid) ->

 7011: 	      "~n   SN:   ~p"
 7012: 	      "~n   Tid:  ~p"

 7018:     io:format("rsmms1_mg_do_verify_notify_reply -> ok"
 7019: 	      "~n   Tid:  ~p"
 7020: 	      "~n   AR:   ~p"
 7021: 	      "~n", [Tid, AR]),
 7022:     CR = 
 7023: 	case AR of
 7024: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
 7025: 		CmdRep;
 7026: 	    _ ->
 7027: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 7028: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
 7029: 	end,
 7030:     NR = 
 7031: 	case CR of
 7032: 	    {notifyReply, NotifyReply} ->
 7033: 		NotifyReply;
 7034: 	    _ ->
 7035: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
 7036: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
 7037: 	end,
 7038:     case NR of
 7039: 	#'NotifyReply'{terminationID   = [Tid],
 7040: 		       errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 7041: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
 7042: 	_ ->
 7043: 	    Reason3 = {invalid_NotifyReply, NR}, 
 7044: 	    {error, Reason3, ok}
 7045:     end.

 7073: 	{no_controlling_process,shutdown} ->
 7074: 	    {ok, R, ok};

 7077:     end;

 7085: rsmms1_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 7086:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 7087:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 7088:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 7089:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 7090:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 7091:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 7092:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 7093: 
 7094: rsmms1_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tids, Cid) ->
 7095:     rsmms1_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tids, Cid, []).
 7096: 
 7097: rsmms1_mg_notify_request_ar(_Rid, [], Cid, Cmds) ->
 7098:     cre_actionReq(Cid, lists:reverse(Cmds));
 7099: rsmms1_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, [Tid|Tids], Cid, Cmds) ->
 7100:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 7101:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 7102:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 7103:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 7104:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 7105:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 7106:     rsmms1_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tids, Cid, [CR|Cmds]).
