 7111: recv_segmented_msg_missing_seg2(suite) ->
 7112:     [];
 7113: recv_segmented_msg_missing_seg2(doc) ->
 7114:     "Received segmented megaco message with one segment missing "
 7115: 	"using incremental recv segment timer";
 7116: recv_segmented_msg_missing_seg2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 7117:     Pre = fun() ->
 7118:                   MgcNode = make_node_name(mgc),
 7119:                   MgNode  = make_node_name(mg),
 7120:                   d("start nodes: "
 7121:                     "~n   MgcNode: ~p"
 7122:                     "~n   MgNode:  ~p",
 7123:                     [MgcNode, MgNode]),
 7124:                   Nodes = [MgcNode, MgNode],
 7125:                   ok = ?START_NODES(Nodes),
 7126:                   Nodes
 7127:           end,
 7128:     Case = fun do_recv_segmented_msg_missing_seg2/1,
 7129:     Post = fun(Nodes) ->
 7130:                    d("stop nodes"),
 7131:                    ?STOP_NODES(lists:reverse(Nodes))
 7132:            end,
 7133:     try_tc(rsmms2, Pre, Case, Post).
 7134: 
 7135: do_recv_segmented_msg_missing_seg2([MgcNode, MgNode]) ->
 7136: 
 7137:     d("[MGC] start the simulator "),
 7138:     {ok, Mgc} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:start_link("MGC", MgcNode),
 7139: 
 7140:     d("[MGC] create the event sequence"),
 7141:     MgcEvSeq = rsmms2_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 7142: 
 7143:     i("wait some time before starting the MGC simulation"),
 7144:     sleep(1000),
 7145: 
 7146:     d("[MGC] start the simulation"),
 7147:     {ok, MgcId} = megaco_test_tcp_generator:exec(Mgc, MgcEvSeq),
 7148: 
 7149:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulator"),
 7150:     sleep(1000),
 7151: 
 7152:     d("[MG] start the simulator (generator)"),
 7153:     {ok, Mg} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:start_link("MG", MgNode),
 7154: 
 7155:     d("[MG] create the event sequence"),
 7156:     MgEvSeq = rsmms2_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp),
 7157: 
 7158:     i("wait some time before starting the MG simulation"),
 7159:     sleep(1000),
 7160: 
 7161:     d("[MG] start the simulation"),
 7162:     {ok, MgId} = megaco_test_megaco_generator:exec(Mg, MgEvSeq),
 7163: 
 7164:     d("await the generator reply(s)"),
 7165:     await_completion([MgcId, MgId]),
 7166: 
 7167:     %% Tell Mgc to stop
 7168:     i("[MGC] stop generator"),
 7169:     megaco_test_tcp_generator:stop(Mgc),
 7170: 
 7171:     %% Tell Mg to stop
 7172:     i("[MG] stop generator"),
 7173:     megaco_test_megaco_generator:stop(Mg),
 7174: 
 7175:     i("done", []),
 7176:     ok.
 7177: 
 7178: 
 7179: %%
 7180: %% MGC generator stuff
 7181: %%
 7182: 
 7183: rsmms2_mgc_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 7184:     DecodeFun = rsmms2_mgc_decode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 7185:     EncodeFun = rsmms2_mgc_encode_msg_fun(megaco_pretty_text_encoder, []),
 7186:     Mid       = {deviceName,"mgc"},
 7187:     ScrVerifyFun     = rsmms2_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun(),
 7188:     ServiceChangeRep = rsmms2_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, 1),
 7189:     TermId1   = 
 7190: 	#megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000001"]},
 7191:     TermId2   = 
 7192: 	#megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000002"]},
 7193:     TermId3   = 
 7194: 	#megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000003"]},
 7195:     TermIds   = [TermId1, TermId2, TermId3], 
 7196:     TransId   = 2,
 7197:     ReqId     = 1,
 7198:     CtxId     = 1, 
 7199:     NrVerifyFun  = 
 7200: 	rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(TermIds, TransId, ReqId, CtxId),
 7201:     NotifyRep1   = 
 7202: 	rsmms2_mgc_notify_reply_msg(1, Mid, TransId, CtxId, TermId1),
 7203:     NotifyRep3   = 
 7204: 	rsmms2_mgc_notify_reply_msg(3, Mid, TransId, CtxId, TermId3),
 7205:     SrVerifyFun1 = rsmms2_mgc_verify_segment_reply_msg_fun(1, TransId),
 7206:     SrVerifyFun3 = rsmms2_mgc_verify_segment_reply_msg_fun(3, TransId),
 7207:     MissingSegVerifyFun = rsmms2_mgc_verify_missing_segment_fun("2"),
 7208:     EvSeq = [{debug,  false},
 7209:              {decode, DecodeFun},
 7210:              {encode, EncodeFun},
 7211:              {listen, 2944},
 7212: 	     {expect_accept, any},
 7213:              {expect_receive, "service-change-request", {ScrVerifyFun, 5000}},
 7214:              {send, "service-change-reply",             ServiceChangeRep},
 7215:              {expect_receive, "notify-request",         {NrVerifyFun,  4000}},
 7216:              {sleep, 1000},
 7217:              {send, "notify reply - segment 1",         NotifyRep1},
 7218:              {expect_receive, "segment reply 1",        {SrVerifyFun1, 2000}},
 7219:              {sleep, 1000},
 7220:              {send, "notify reply - segment 3",         NotifyRep3},
 7221:              {expect_receive, "segment reply 3",        {SrVerifyFun3, 2000}},
 7222:              {expect_receive, "missing segment error",  {MissingSegVerifyFun, 4000}},
 7223: 	     {expect_nothing, 10000},
 7224:              disconnect
 7225:             ],
 7226:     EvSeq.
 7227: 
 7228: rsmms2_mgc_encode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 7229:     fun(M) ->
 7230:             Mod:encode_message(Conf, M)
 7231:     end.
 7232: 
 7233: rsmms2_mgc_decode_msg_fun(Mod, Conf) ->
 7234:     fun(M) ->
 7235:             Mod:decode_message(Conf, M)
 7236:     end.
 7237: 
 7238: rsmms2_mgc_verify_service_change_req_msg_fun() ->
 7239:     fun(Msg) -> 
 7240: 	    (catch rsmms2_mgc_verify_service_change_req(Msg)) 
 7241:     end.
 7242: 
 7243: rsmms2_mgc_verify_service_change_req(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M) ->
 7244:     io:format("rsmms2_mgc_verify_service_change_req -> entry with"
 7245: 	      "~n   M: ~p"
 7246: 	      "~n", [M]),
 7247:     Body = 
 7248: 	case Mess of 
 7249: 	    #'Message'{version     = 1, 
 7250:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 7251:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 7252: 		MsgBody;
 7253: 	    _ ->
 7254: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 7255: 	end,
 7256:     Trans = 
 7257: 	case Body of
 7258:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 7259: 		Transactions;
 7260: 	    _ ->
 7261: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 7262: 	end,
 7263:     TR = 
 7264: 	case Trans of
 7265:             {transactionRequest, TransRequest} ->
 7266: 		TransRequest;
 7267: 	    _ ->
 7268: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 7269: 	end,
 7270:     AR = 
 7271: 	case TR of
 7272:             #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = _TransId,
 7273: 				  actions       = [ActionReq]} ->
 7274: 		ActionReq;
 7275: 	    _ ->
 7276: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR}})
 7277: 	end,
 7278:     CR = 
 7279: 	case AR of
 7280: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = _Cid, 
 7281: 			     commandRequests = [CmdReq]} ->
 7282: 		CmdReq;
 7283: 	    _ ->
 7284: 		throw({error, {invalid_action, AR}})
 7285: 	end,
 7286:     Cmd = 
 7287: 	case CR of
 7288: 	    #'CommandRequest'{command = Command} ->
 7289: 		Command; 
 7290: 	    _ ->
 7291: 		throw({error, {invalid_commandRequest, CR}})
 7292: 	end,
 7293:     {Tid, Parms} = 
 7294: 	case Cmd of
 7295: 	    {serviceChangeReq, 
 7296: 	     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID      = [TermID],
 7297: 				     serviceChangeParms = ServChParms}} ->
 7298: 		{TermID, ServChParms};
 7299: 	    _ ->
 7300: 		throw({error, {invalid_command, Cmd}})
 7301: 	end,
 7302:     case Tid of
 7303: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 7304: 	    ok;
 7305: 	_ ->
 7306: 	    throw({error, {invalid_terminationID, Tid}})
 7307:     end,
 7308:     case Parms of
 7309: 	%% Version 1 'ServiceChangeParm'
 7310: 	{'ServiceChangeParm', 
 7311: 	 restart,                            % serviceChangeMethod
 7312: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % serviceChangeAddress
 7313: 	 ?VERSION,                           % serviceChangeVersion,
 7314: 	 {'ServiceChangeProfile',"resgw",1}, % serviceChangeProfile
 7315: 	 [[$9,$0,$1|_]],                     % serviceChangeReason
 7316: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % serviceChangeDelay
 7317: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % serviceChangeMgcId
 7318: 	 asn1_NOVALUE,                       % timeStamp
 7319: 	 asn1_NOVALUE                        % nonStandardData
 7320: 	} ->
 7321: 	    {ok, M};
 7322: 	_ ->
 7323: 	    {error, {invalid_serviceChangeParms, Parms}}
 7324:     end.
 7325: 
 7326: rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req_msg_fun(TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 7327:     fun(Msg) -> 
 7328: 	    (catch rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req(Msg, 
 7329: 					      TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid)) 
 7330:     end.
 7331: 
 7332: rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M,
 7333: 			     TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid) ->
 7334:     io:format("rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req -> entry with"
 7335: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 7336: 	      "~n   TermIds: ~p"
 7337: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 7338: 	      "~n   Rid:     ~p"
 7339: 	      "~n   Cid:     ~p"
 7340: 	      "~n", [M, TermIds, TransId, Rid, Cid]),
 7341:     Body = 
 7342: 	case Mess of 
 7343: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 7344:                        mId         = _Mid,
 7345:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 7346: 		MsgBody;
 7347: 	    _ ->
 7348: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 7349: 	end,
 7350:     Trans = 
 7351: 	case Body of
 7352:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 7353: 		Transactions;
 7354: 	    _ ->
 7355: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 7356: 	end,
 7357:     TR = 
 7358: 	case Trans of
 7359:             {transactionRequest, TransRequest} ->
 7360: 		TransRequest;
 7361: 	    _ ->
 7362: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 7363: 	end,
 7364:     AR = 
 7365: 	case TR of
 7366:             #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = TransId,
 7367: 				  actions       = [ActReq]} ->
 7368: 		ActReq;
 7369: 	    _ ->
 7370: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactionRequest, TR}})
 7371: 	end,
 7372:     Cmds = 
 7373: 	case AR of
 7374: 	    #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = Cid,
 7375: 			     commandRequests = Commands} ->
 7376: 		Commands;
 7377: 	    _ ->
 7378: 		throw({error, {invalid_actions, AR}})
 7379: 	end,
 7380:     ok = rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds(TermIds, Cmds),
 7381:     {ok, M};
 7382: rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req(Crap, _TermId, _TransId, _Rid, _Cid) ->
 7383:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap}}.
 7384: 
 7385: rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds([], []) ->
 7386:     ok;
 7387: rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds([TermId|TermIds], [Cmd|Cmds]) ->
 7388:     rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd(TermId, Cmd),
 7389:     rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds(TermIds, Cmds);
 7390: rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmds(TermIds, Cmds) ->
 7391:      throw({error, {invalid_commands, TermIds, Cmds}}).
 7392: 
 7393: rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd(TermId, #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd}) ->
 7394:     io:format("rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd -> entry with"
 7395: 	      "~n   TermId: ~p"
 7396: 	      "~n   Cmd:    ~p"
 7397: 	      "~n", [TermId, Cmd]),
 7398:     NR = 
 7399: 	case Cmd of
 7400: 	    {notifyReq, NotifReq} ->
 7401: 		NotifReq;
 7402: 	    _ ->
 7403: 		throw({error, {invalid_command}})
 7404: 	end,
 7405:     OED = 
 7406: 	case NR of
 7407: 	    #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = [TermId],
 7408: 			     observedEventsDescriptor = ObsEvsDesc,
 7409: 			     errorDescriptor          = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 7410: 		ObsEvsDesc;
 7411: 	    _ ->
 7412: 		throw({error, {invalid_notifyReq, NR}})
 7413: 	end,
 7414:     OE = 
 7415: 	case OED of 
 7416: 	    #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{observedEventLst = [ObsEvLst]} ->
 7417: 		ObsEvLst;
 7418: 	    _ ->
 7419: 		throw({error, {invalid_observedEventsDescriptor, OED}})
 7420: 	end,
 7421:     case OE of
 7422: 	#'ObservedEvent'{eventName = "al/of"} ->
 7423: 	    ok;
 7424: 	_ ->
 7425: 	    throw({error, {invalid_observedEventLst, OE}})
 7426:     end;
 7427: rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd(_, BadCmdReq) ->
 7428:     io:format("rsmms2_mgc_verify_notify_req_cmd -> invalid"
 7429: 	      "~n   BadCmdReq: ~p"
 7430: 	      "~n", [BadCmdReq]),
 7431:     throw({error, {invalid_CommandRequest, BadCmdReq}}).
 7432: 
 7433: rsmms2_mgc_verify_segment_reply_msg_fun(SN, TransId) ->
 7434:     fun(Msg) -> 
 7435: 	    (catch rsmms2_mgc_verify_segment_reply(Msg, SN, TransId)) 
 7436:     end.
 7437: 
 7438: rsmms2_mgc_verify_segment_reply(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M, 
 7439: 			      SN, TransId) ->
 7440:     io:format("rsmms2_mgc_verify_segment_reply -> entry with"
 7441: 	      "~n   SN:      ~p"
 7442: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 7443: 	      "~n   M:       ~p"
 7444: 	      "~n", [SN, TransId, M]),
 7445:     Body = 
 7446: 	case Mess of 
 7447: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 7448:                        mId         = _MgMid,
 7449:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 7450: 		MsgBody;
 7451: 	    _ ->
 7452: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 7453: 	end,
 7454:     Trans = 
 7455: 	case Body of
 7456:             {transactions, [Transactions]} ->
 7457: 		Transactions;
 7458: 	    _ ->
 7459: 		throw({error, {invalid_messageBody, Body}})
 7460: 	end,
 7461:     SR = 
 7462: 	case Trans of
 7463:             {segmentReply, SegmentReply} ->
 7464: 		SegmentReply;
 7465: 	    _ ->
 7466: 		throw({error, {invalid_transactions, Trans}})
 7467: 	end,
 7468:     case SR of
 7469: 	#'SegmentReply'{transactionId        = TransId,
 7470: 			segmentNumber        = SN,
 7471: 			segmentationComplete = 'NULL'} when SN == 3 ->
 7472: 	    {ok, M};
 7473: 	#'SegmentReply'{transactionId        = TransId,
 7474: 			segmentNumber        = SN,
 7475: 			segmentationComplete = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 7476: 	    {ok, M};
 7477: 	_ ->
 7478: 	    throw({error, {invalid_segmentReply, SR}})
 7479:     end;
 7480: rsmms2_mgc_verify_segment_reply(Crap, SN, TransId) ->
 7481:     io:format("rsmms2_mgc_verify_segment_reply -> invalid: "
 7482: 	      "~n   SN:      ~p"
 7483: 	      "~n   TransId: ~p"
 7484: 	      "~n   Crap:    ~p"
 7485: 	      "~n", [SN, TransId, Crap]),
 7486:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap, SN, TransId}}.
 7487: 
 7488: 
 7489: rsmms2_mgc_verify_missing_segment_fun(SN) ->
 7490:     fun(Msg) -> (catch rsmms2_mgc_verify_missing_segment(Msg, SN)) end.
 7491: 
 7492: rsmms2_mgc_verify_missing_segment(#'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess} = M, Text) ->
 7493:     io:format("rsmms2_mgc_verify_missing_segment -> entry with"
 7494: 	      "~n   Text: ~p"
 7495: 	      "~n   M:    ~p"
 7496: 	      "~n", [Text, M]),
 7497:     Body = 
 7498: 	case Mess of 
 7499: 	    #'Message'{version     = ?VERSION,
 7500:                        mId         = _Mid,
 7501:                        messageBody = MsgBody} ->
 7502: 		MsgBody;
 7503: 	    _ ->
 7504: 		throw({error, {invalid_Message, Mess}})
 7505: 	end,
 7506:     case Body of
 7507: 	{messageError, 
 7508: 	 #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = ?megaco_segments_not_received,
 7509: 			    errorText = Text}} ->
 7510: 	    {ok, M};
 7511: 	_ ->
 7512: 	    throw({error, {invalid_messageError, Body}})
 7513:     end;
 7514: rsmms2_mgc_verify_missing_segment(Crap, _SN) ->
 7515:     {error, {invalid_MegacoMessage, Crap}}.
 7516:     
 7517: rsmms2_mgc_service_change_reply_msg(Mid, Cid) ->
 7518:     SCRP  = cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid),
 7519:     SCRes = cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP),
 7520:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 7521:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReply([Root], SCRes),
 7522:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(SCR),
 7523:     AR    = cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]),
 7524:     TRes  = cre_transResult([AR]),
 7525:     TR    = {'TransactionReply', 1, asn1_NOVALUE, TRes}, 
 7526:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 7527:     Mess  = cre_message(1, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 7528:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 7529: 
 7530: rsmms2_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId) ->
 7531:     NR    = cre_notifyReply([TermId]),
 7532:     CR    = cre_cmdReply(NR),
 7533:     cre_actionReply(Cid, [CR]).
 7534: 
 7535: rsmms2_mgc_notify_reply_msg(SN, Mid, TransId, Cid, TermId) ->
 7536:     AR    = rsmms2_mgc_notify_reply_ar(Cid, TermId),
 7537:     TRes  = cre_transResult([AR]),
 7538:     TR =
 7539: 	if
 7540: 	    SN == 3 ->
 7541: 		cre_transReply(TransId, TRes, SN, 'NULL');
 7542: 	    true ->
 7543: 		cre_transReply(TransId, TRes, SN)
 7544: 	end,
 7545:     Trans = cre_transaction(TR),
 7546:     Mess  = cre_message(?VERSION, Mid, cre_transactions([Trans])),
 7547:     cre_megacoMessage(Mess).
 7548:

 7551: %% MG generator stuff

 7553: rsmms2_mg_event_sequence(text, tcp) ->
 7554:     Mid = {deviceName,"mg"},
 7555:     RI = [
 7556:           {port,             2944},
 7557:           {encoding_module,  megaco_pretty_text_encoder},
 7558:           {encoding_config,  []},
 7559:           {transport_module, megaco_tcp}
 7560:          ],
 7561:     SegRecvTmr = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 1000,
 7562: 				    factor      = 1, 
 7563: 				    incr        = 0,
 7564: 				    max_retries = 2
 7565: 				   },    
 7566:     ServiceChangeReq = rsmms2_mg_service_change_request_ar(Mid, 1),
 7567:     ConnectVerify = rsmms2_mg_verify_handle_connect_fun(),
 7568:     ServiceChangeReplyVerify = rsmms2_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun(),
 7569:     Tid1 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000001"]},
 7570:     Tid2 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000002"]},
 7571:     Tid3 = #megaco_term_id{id = ["00000000","00000000","00000003"]},
 7572:     Tids = [Tid1, Tid2, Tid3],
 7573:     NotifyReq = rsmms2_mg_notify_request_ar(1, Tids, 1),
 7574:     NotifyReplyVerify1 = rsmms2_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(1, Tid1),
 7575:     NotifyReplyVerify3 = rsmms2_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(3, Tid3),
 7576:     SegTimeoutVerify   = rsmms2_mg_verify_segment_timeout_fun(2), 
 7577:     DiscoVerify        = rsmms2_mg_verify_handle_disco_fun(), 
 7578:     EvSeq = [
 7579:              {debug, true},
 7580:              {megaco_trace, disable},
 7581:              %% {megaco_trace, max},
 7582:              megaco_start,
 7583:              {megaco_start_user, Mid, RI, []},
 7584:              start_transport,
 7585:              {megaco_system_info, users},
 7586:              {megaco_system_info, connections},
 7587: 	     {megaco_update_user_info, segment_recv_timer,  SegRecvTmr}, 
 7588:              connect,
 7589:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect, ConnectVerify},
 7590:              megaco_connect,
 7591:              {megaco_cast,     [ServiceChangeReq], []},
 7592:              {megaco_callback, handle_connect,     ConnectVerify},
 7593:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, ServiceChangeReplyVerify},
 7594: 	     {megaco_update_conn_info, protocol_version, ?VERSION}, 
 7595:              {sleep, 1000},
 7596:              {megaco_cast,     [NotifyReq],        []},
 7597:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify1},
 7598:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, NotifyReplyVerify3},
 7599:              {megaco_callback, handle_trans_reply, SegTimeoutVerify},
 7600:              {megaco_callback, handle_disconnect,  DiscoVerify},
 7601:              megaco_stop_user,
 7602:              megaco_stop
 7603:             ],
 7604:     EvSeq.

 7620: rsmms2_mg_verify_service_change_reply_fun() ->
 7621:     fun(Rep) -> rsmms2_mg_verify_scr(Rep) end.
 7622: 
 7623: rsmms2_mg_verify_scr({handle_trans_reply, _CH, 1, {ok, [AR]}, _}) ->
 7624:     (catch rsmms2_mg_do_verify_scr(AR));
 7625: rsmms2_mg_verify_scr(Crap) ->
 7626:     io:format("rsmms2_mg_verify_scr -> error: "
 7627: 	      "~n   Crap: ~p"
 7628: 	      "~n", [Crap]),
 7629:     {error, Crap, ok}.
 7630: 
 7631: rsmms2_mg_do_verify_scr(AR) ->
 7632:     io:format("rsmms2_mg_do_verify_scr -> ok: "
 7633: 	      "~n   AR: ~p~n", [AR]),
 7634:     CR = 
 7635: 	case AR of
 7636: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
 7637: 		CmdRep;
 7638: 	    _ ->
 7639: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 7640: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
 7641: 	end,
 7642:     SCR = 
 7643: 	case CR of
 7644: 	    {serviceChangeReply, ServChRep} ->
 7645: 		ServChRep;
 7646: 	    _ ->
 7647: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
 7648: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
 7649: 	end,
 7650:     {Tid, SCRes} = 
 7651: 	case SCR of
 7652: 	    #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = [TermID],
 7653: 				  serviceChangeResult = Res} ->
 7654: 		{TermID, Res};
 7655: 	    _ ->
 7656: 		Reason3 = {invalid_service_change_reply, SCR},
 7657: 		throw({error, Reason3, ok})
 7658: 	end,
 7659:     case Tid of
 7660: 	#megaco_term_id{contains_wildcards = false, id = ["root"]} ->
 7661: 	    ok;
 7662: 	_ ->
 7663: 	    Reason4 = {invalid_termination_id, Tid},
 7664: 	    throw({error, Reason4, ok})
 7665:     end,
 7666:     SCRParm = 
 7667: 	case SCRes of
 7668: 	    {serviceChangeResParms, ServChResParms} ->
 7669: 		ServChResParms;
 7670: 	    _ ->
 7671: 		Reason5 = {invalid_serviceChangeResult, SCRes},
 7672: 		throw({error, Reason5, ok})
 7673: 	end,
 7674:     case SCRParm of
 7675: 	#'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId = _RemoteMid} ->
 7676: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
 7677: 	_ ->
 7678: 	    Reason6 = {invalid_service_change_result, SCRParm},
 7679: 	    {error, Reason6, ok}
 7680:     end.
 7681: 
 7682: rsmms2_mg_verify_notify_reply_fun(SN, Tid) ->
 7683:     fun(Rep) -> rsmms2_mg_verify_notify_reply(Rep, SN, Tid) end.
 7684: 	     
 7685: rsmms2_mg_verify_notify_reply(
 7686:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {ok, {SN, Last, [AR]}}, _}, SN, Tid) 
 7687:   when (Last == false) ->
 7688:     (catch rsmms2_mg_do_verify_notify_reply(Tid, AR));
 7689: rsmms2_mg_verify_notify_reply(Crap, SN, Tid) ->
 7690:     io:format("rsmms2_mg_verify_notify_reply -> unknown reply"
 7691: 	      "~n   SN:   ~p"
 7692: 	      "~n   Tid:  ~p"
 7693: 	      "~n   Crap: ~p"
 7694: 	      "~n", [SN, Tid, Crap]),
 7695:     {error, Crap, ok}.
 7696: 
 7697: rsmms2_mg_do_verify_notify_reply(Tid, AR) ->
 7698:     io:format("rsmms2_mg_do_verify_notify_reply -> ok"
 7699: 	      "~n   Tid:  ~p"
 7700: 	      "~n   AR:   ~p"
 7701: 	      "~n", [Tid, AR]),
 7702:     CR = 
 7703: 	case AR of
 7704: 	    #'ActionReply'{commandReply = [CmdRep]} ->
 7705: 		CmdRep;
 7706: 	    _ ->
 7707: 		Reason1 = {invalid_action_reply, AR},
 7708: 		throw({error, Reason1, ok})
 7709: 	end,
 7710:     NR = 
 7711: 	case CR of
 7712: 	    {notifyReply, NotifyReply} ->
 7713: 		NotifyReply;
 7714: 	    _ ->
 7715: 		Reason2 = {invalid_command_reply, CR},
 7716: 		throw({error, Reason2, ok})
 7717: 	end,
 7718:     case NR of
 7719: 	#'NotifyReply'{terminationID   = [Tid],
 7720: 		       errorDescriptor = asn1_NOVALUE} ->
 7721: 	    {ok, AR, ok};
 7722: 	_ ->
 7723: 	    Reason3 = {invalid_NotifyReply, NR}, 
 7724: 	    {error, Reason3, ok}
 7725:     end.
 7726: 
 7727: rsmms2_mg_verify_segment_timeout_fun(SN) ->
 7728:     fun(Rep) -> rsmms2_mg_verify_segment_timeout(Rep, SN) end.
 7729: 	     
 7730: rsmms2_mg_verify_segment_timeout(
 7731:   {handle_trans_reply, _CH, ?VERSION, {error, Reason}, _}, SN) ->
 7732:     case Reason of
 7733: 	{segment_timeout, [SN]} ->
 7734: 	    {ok, Reason, ok};
 7735: 	_ ->
 7736: 	    {error, {invalid_reason, Reason}, ok}
 7737:     end;
 7738: rsmms2_mg_verify_segment_timeout(Crap, SN) ->
 7739:     io:format("rsmms2_mg_verify_segment_timeout -> unknown reply"
 7740: 	      "~n   SN:   ~p"
 7741: 	      "~n   Crap: ~p"
 7742: 	      "~n", [SN, Crap]),
 7743:     {error, Crap, ok}.
 7744: 
 7745: rsmms2_mg_verify_handle_disco_fun() ->
 7746:     fun(Ev) -> rsmms2_mg_verify_handle_disconnect(Ev) end.
 7747: 
 7748: rsmms2_mg_verify_handle_disconnect({handle_disconnect, _CH, ?VERSION, R}) ->
 7749:     io:format("rsmms2_mg_verify_handle_disconnect -> ok"
 7750: 	      "~n   R: ~p"
 7751: 	      "~n", [R]),
 7752:     case R of
 7753: 	{no_controlling_process,shutdown} ->
 7754: 	    {ok, R, ok};
 7755: 	_ ->
 7756: 	    {error, {unexpected_reason, R}, ok}
 7757:     end;
 7758: rsmms2_mg_verify_handle_disconnect(Crap) ->
 7759:     io:format("rsmms2_mg_verify_handle_disconnect -> invalid: "
 7760: 	      "~n   Crap: ~p"
 7761: 	      "~n", [Crap]),
 7762:     {error, Crap, ok}.
 7763:     
 7764: 	     
 7765: rsmms2_mg_service_change_request_ar(_Mid, Cid) ->
 7766:     Prof  = cre_serviceChangeProf("resgw", 1),
 7767:     SCP   = cre_serviceChangeParm(restart, ["901 mg col boot"], Prof),
 7768:     Root  = #megaco_term_id{id = ["root"]},
 7769:     SCR   = cre_serviceChangeReq([Root], SCP),
 7770:     CMD   = cre_command(SCR),
 7771:     CR    = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 7772:     cre_actionReq(Cid, [CR]).
 7773: 
 7774: rsmms2_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tids, Cid) ->
 7775:     rsmms2_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tids, Cid, []).
 7776: 
 7777: rsmms2_mg_notify_request_ar(_Rid, [], Cid, Cmds) ->
 7778:     cre_actionReq(Cid, lists:reverse(Cmds));
 7779: rsmms2_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, [Tid|Tids], Cid, Cmds) ->
 7780:     TT      = cre_timeNotation("19990729", "22000000"),
 7781:     Ev      = cre_obsEvent("al/of", TT),
 7782:     EvsDesc = cre_obsEvsDesc(Rid, [Ev]),
 7783:     NR      = cre_notifyReq([Tid], EvsDesc),
 7784:     CMD     = cre_command(NR),
 7785:     CR      = cre_cmdReq(CMD),
 7786:     rsmms2_mg_notify_request_ar(Rid, Tids, Cid, [CR|Cmds]).
 7787: 
 7788: 
 7789: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7790: %%
 7791: %% Common message creation functions
 7792: %%
 7793: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7794: 
 7795: %% cre_errorDesc(Code, Text) when is_list(Text) ->
 7796: %%     #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = Code, errorText = Text};
 7797: %% cre_errorDesc(Code, Text0) ->
 7798: %%     Text = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("~w",[Text0])),
 7799: %%     #'ErrorDescriptor'{errorCode = Code, errorText = Text}.
 7800: 
 7801: cre_segReply(TransId, SN, SC) ->
 7802:     megaco_test_msg_v3_lib:cre_SegmentReply(TransId, SN, SC).
 7803: 
 7804: cre_serviceChangeParm(M,R,P) ->
 7805:     %% Version 1 'ServiceChangeParm'
 7806:     {'ServiceChangeParm',
 7807:      M,            % serviceChangeMethod,
 7808:      asn1_NOVALUE, % serviceChangeAddress
 7809:      ?VERSION,     % serviceChangeVersion
 7810:      P,            % serviceChangeProfile
 7811:      R,            % serviceChangeReason
 7812:      asn1_NOVALUE, % serviceChangeDelay
 7813:      asn1_NOVALUE, % serviceChangeMgcId
 7814:      asn1_NOVALUE, % timeStamp
 7815:      asn1_NOVALUE  % nonStandardData
 7816:     }.
 7817: 
 7818: cre_serviceChangeReq(Tid, Parms) ->
 7819:     #'ServiceChangeRequest'{terminationID      = Tid, 
 7820:                             serviceChangeParms = Parms}.
 7821: 
 7822: cre_timeNotation(D,T) ->
 7823:     #'TimeNotation'{date = D, time = T}.
 7824: 
 7825: cre_obsEvent(Name, Not) ->
 7826:     #'ObservedEvent'{eventName    = Name, 
 7827:                      timeNotation = Not}.
 7828: %% cre_obsEvent(Name, Not, Par) ->
 7829: %%     #'ObservedEvent'{eventName    = Name, 
 7830: %%                      timeNotation = Not, 
 7831: %%                      eventParList = Par}.
 7832: 
 7833: cre_obsEvsDesc(Id, EvList) ->
 7834:     #'ObservedEventsDescriptor'{requestId        = Id, 
 7835:                                 observedEventLst = EvList}.
 7836: 
 7837: cre_notifyReq(Tid, EvsDesc) ->
 7838:     #'NotifyRequest'{terminationID            = Tid, 
 7839:                      observedEventsDescriptor = EvsDesc}.
 7840: 
 7841: cre_command(R) when is_record(R, 'NotifyRequest') ->
 7842:     {notifyReq, R};
 7843: cre_command(R) when is_record(R, 'ServiceChangeRequest') ->
 7844:     {serviceChangeReq, R}.
 7845: 
 7846: cre_cmdReq(Cmd) ->
 7847:     #'CommandRequest'{command = Cmd}.
 7848: 
 7849: cre_actionReq(CtxId, CmdReqs) when is_list(CmdReqs) ->
 7850:     #'ActionRequest'{contextId       = CtxId,
 7851:                      commandRequests = CmdReqs}.
 7852: 
 7853: cre_transReq(TransId, ARs) when is_list(ARs) ->
 7854:     #'TransactionRequest'{transactionId = TransId,
 7855: 			  actions       = ARs}.
 7856: 
 7857: %% --
 7858: 
 7859: cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid) ->
 7860:     cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid, ?VERSION).
 7861: 
 7862: cre_serviceChangeResParm(Mid, V) ->
 7863:     #'ServiceChangeResParm'{serviceChangeMgcId   = Mid, 
 7864: 			    serviceChangeVersion = V}.
 7865: 
 7866: cre_serviceChangeResult(SCRP) when is_record(SCRP, 'ServiceChangeResParm') ->
 7867:     {serviceChangeResParms, SCRP};
 7868: cre_serviceChangeResult(ED) when is_record(ED, 'ErrorDescriptor') ->
 7869:     {errorDescriptor, ED}.
 7870: 
 7871: cre_serviceChangeReply(Tid, Res) ->
 7872:     #'ServiceChangeReply'{terminationID       = Tid, 
 7873:                           serviceChangeResult = Res}.
 7874: 
 7875: cre_cmdReply(R) when is_record(R, 'NotifyReply') ->
 7876:     {notifyReply, R};
 7877: cre_cmdReply(R) when is_record(R, 'ServiceChangeReply') ->
 7878:     {serviceChangeReply, R}.
 7879: 
 7880: cre_notifyReply(Tid) ->
 7881:     #'NotifyReply'{terminationID = Tid}.
 7882: 
 7883: cre_actionReply(CtxId, CmdRep) ->
 7884:     #'ActionReply'{contextId    = CtxId,
 7885:                    commandReply = CmdRep}.
 7886: 
 7887: cre_transResult(ED) when is_record(ED, 'ErrorDescriptor') ->
 7888:     {transactionError, ED};
 7889: cre_transResult([AR|_] = ARs) when is_record(AR, 'ActionReply') ->
 7890:     {actionReplies, ARs}.
 7891: 
 7892: %% cre_transReply(TransId, Res) ->
 7893: %%     #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
 7894: %%                         transactionResult = Res}.
 7895: 
 7896: cre_transReply(TransId, Res, SN) ->
 7897:     #'TransactionReply'{transactionId     = TransId,
 7898:                         transactionResult = Res,
 7899: 			segmentNumber     = SN}.
 7900: 
 7901: cre_transReply(TransId, Res, SN, SC) ->
 7902:     #'TransactionReply'{transactionId        = TransId,
 7903:                         transactionResult    = Res,
 7904: 			segmentNumber        = SN,
 7905: 			segmentationComplete = SC}.
 7906: 
 7907: cre_transAck(TransId) ->
 7908:     megaco_test_msg_v3_lib:cre_TransactionAck(TransId).
 7909: 
 7910: 
 7911: %% --
 7912: 
 7913: cre_serviceChangeProf(Name, Ver) when is_list(Name) andalso is_integer(Ver) ->
 7914:     #'ServiceChangeProfile'{profileName = Name, 
 7915:                             version     = Ver}.
 7916: 
 7917: cre_transaction(Trans) when is_record(Trans, 'TransactionRequest') ->
 7918:     {transactionRequest, Trans};
 7919: cre_transaction(Trans) when is_record(Trans, 'TransactionPending') ->
 7920:     {transactionPending, Trans};
 7921: cre_transaction(Trans) 
 7922:   when is_record(Trans, 'TransactionReply') or
 7923:        (is_tuple(Trans) and (element(1, Trans) == 'TransactionReply')) ->
 7924:     {transactionReply, Trans};
 7925: cre_transaction(Trans) when is_list(Trans) ->
 7926:     {transactionResponseAck, Trans};
 7927: cre_transaction(SR) when is_record(SR, 'SegmentReply') ->
 7928:     {segmentReply, SR}.
 7929: 
 7930: cre_transactions(Trans) when is_list(Trans) ->
 7931:     {transactions, Trans}.
 7932: 
 7933: cre_message(Version, Mid, Body) ->
 7934:     #'Message'{version     = Version,
 7935:                mId         = Mid,
 7936:                messageBody = Body}.
 7937: 
 7938: cre_megacoMessage(Mess) ->
 7939:     #'MegacoMessage'{mess = Mess}.
 7940: 
 7941: 
 7942: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7943: 
 7944: %% Transform a short timer to a long one.
 7945: %% The purpose of this is to trick the stack
 7946: %% to keep re-sending the request, even after 
 7947: %% having received the first pending (which
 7948: %% indicates that the other side _IS_ 
 7949: %% working on the request).
 7950: -ifdef(MEGACO_TEST_CODE).
 7951: 
 7952: init_request_timer({short, Ref}) ->
 7953:     {long, Ref};  
 7954: init_request_timer(O) ->
 7955:     O.
 7956: 
 7957: -endif.
 7958: 
 7959: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 7960: 
 7961: await_completion(Ids) ->
 7962:     case megaco_test_generator_lib:await_completion(Ids) of
 7963: 	{ok, Reply} ->
 7964: 	    d("OK => Reply: ~n~p", [Reply]),
 7965: 	    ok;
 7966: 	{error, {OK, ERROR}} ->
 7967: 	    d("ERROR => "
 7968: 	      "~n      OK:    ~p"
 7969: 	      "~n      ERROR: ~p", [OK, ERROR]),
 7970: 	    ?ERROR({failed, ERROR});
 7971: 	{error, Reply} ->
 7972: 	    d("ERROR => "
 7973: 	      "~n      Reply: ~p", [Reply]),
 7974: 	    ?ERROR({failed, Reply})
 7975:     end.
 7976: 
 7977:

 7979: 
 7980: make_node_name(Name) ->
 7981:     case string:tokens(atom_to_list(node()), [$@]) of
 7982: 	[_,Host] ->
 7983: 	    list_to_atom(lists:concat([atom_to_list(Name) ++ "@" ++ Host]));
 7984: 	_ ->
 7985: 	    exit("Test node must be started with '-sname'")
 7986:      end.
 7987:

 7997:     try_tc(TCName, "TEST", ?TEST_VERBOSITY, Pre, Case, Post).

 8000:     ?TRY_TC(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post).

 8004: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 8005: 
 8006: p(F) ->
 8007:     p(F, []).
 8008: 
 8009: p(F, A) ->
 8010:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p ***"
 8011: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
 8012: 	      [?FTS(), self() | A]).
 8013: 
 8014: 
 8015: %% e(F) ->
 8016: %%     e(F, []).
 8017: 
 8018: e(F, A) ->
 8019:     print(error, get(verbosity), "ERROR", get(tc), F, A).
 8020: 
 8021: 
 8022: i(F) ->
 8023:     i(F, []).
 8024: 
 8025: i(F, A) ->
 8026:     print(info, get(verbosity), "INFO", get(tc), F, A).
 8027: 
 8028: 
 8029: d(F) ->
 8030:     d(F, []).
 8031: 
 8032: d(F, A) ->
 8033:     print(debug, get(verbosity), "DBG", get(tc), F, A).
 8034: 
 8035: 
 8036: printable(_, debug)   -> true;
 8037: printable(info, info) -> true;
 8038: printable(error, _)   -> true;
 8039: printable(_,_)        -> false.
 8040: 
 8041: print(Severity, Verbosity, P, TC, F, A) ->
 8042:     print(printable(Severity, Verbosity), P, TC, F, A).
 8043: 
 8044: print(true, P, TC, F, A) when (TC =:= undefined) ->
 8045:     print(P, "", F, A);
 8046: print(true, P, TC, F, A) when is_atom(TC) ->
 8047:     print(P, ":" ++ atom_to_list(TC), F, A);
 8048: print(true, P, TC, F, A) when is_list(TC) ->
 8049:     print(P, TC, F, A);
 8050: print(_, _, _, _, _) ->
 8051:     ok.
 8052: 
 8053: print(P, TCStr, F, A) ->
 8054:     io:format("*** [~s] ~s ~p ~s~s ***"
 8055: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
 8056: 	      [?FTS(), P, self(), get(sname), TCStr | A]).
 8057: 
 8058:

 8060: 
 8061:
